h4.p: [06] ime ^a^T2.0153^ea^ kho panaayasmanto dvenavuti paacittiyaa
[06] dhammaa uddesa.m aagacchanti.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0001^ea^ ^a^V0.0001^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena hatthako sakyaputto vaadakkhitto hoti. so titthiyehi saddhi.m sallapanto ^a^V0.0002^ea^ avajaanitvaa pa.tijaanaati, pa.tijaanitvaa avajaanaati, a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, sampajaanamusaa bhaasati, sa"nketa.m katvaa visa.mvaadeti. titthiyaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama hatthako sakyaputto amhehi saddhi.m sallapanto avajaanitvaa pa.tijaanissati, pa.tijaanitvaa avajaanissati, a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarissati, sampajaanamusaa bhaasissati, sa"nketa.m katvaa visa.mvaadessatii''ti!

[03]assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m titthiyaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu yena hatthako sakyaputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa hatthaka.m sakyaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, aavuso hatthaka, titthiyehi saddhi.m sallapanto avajaanitvaa pa.tijaanaasi, pa.tijaanitvaa avajaanaasi, a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarasi, sampajaanamusaa bhaasasi, sa"nketa.m katvaa visa.mvaadesii''ti? ``ete kho, aavuso, titthiyaa ^a^M0.0002^ea^ naama yena kenaci jetabbaa; neva tesa.m jayo ^a^T2.0154^ea^ daatabbo''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama hatthako sakyaputto titthiyehi saddhi.m sallapanto avajaanitvaa pa.tijaanissati, pa.tijaanitvaa ^a^P4.0002^ea^ avajaanissati, a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarissati, sampajaanamusaa bhaasissati, sa"nketa.m katvaa visa.mvaadessatii''ti!

[03]atha kho te bhikkhuu hatthaka.m sakyaputta.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa hatthaka.m sakyaputta.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, hatthaka, titthiyehi saddhi.m sallapanto avajaanitvaa pa.tijaanaasi, pa.tijaanitvaa avajaanaasi, a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarasi, sampajaanamusaa bhaasasi, sa"nketa.m katvaa visa.mvaadesii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, titthiyehi saddhi.m sallapanto avajaanitvaa pa.tijaanissasi, pa.tijaanitvaa avajaanissasi, a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarissasi, sampajaanamusaa bhaasissasi, sa"nketa.m katvaa visa.mvaadessasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ^b^``sampajaanamusaavaade paacittiya''^eb^nti.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ^b^sampajaanamusaavaado^eb^ naama visa.mvaadanapurekkhaarassa vaacaa, giraa, byappatho, vaciibhedo, vaacasikaa vi~n~natti, a.t.tha anariyavohaaraa -- adi.t.tha.m di.t.tha.m meti, assuta.m suta.m meti, amuta.m muta.m ^a^V0.0003^ea^ meti, avi~n~naata.m vi~n~naata.m meti, di.t.tha.m adi.t.tha.m meti, suta.m assuta.m meti ^a^T2.0155^ea^, muta.m amuta.m meti, vi~n~naata.m avi~n~naata.m meti.

[03]^b^adi.t.tha.m^eb^ naama na cakkhunaa di.t.tha.m. ^b^assuta.m^eb^ naama na sotena suta.m. ^b^amuta.m^eb^ naama na ghaanena ghaayita.m, na jivhaaya saayita.m, na kaayena phu.t.tha.m. ^b^avi~n~naata.m^eb^ naama na manasaa vi~n~naata.m. ^b^di.t.tha.m^eb^ naama cakkhunaa di.t.tha.m. ^b^suta.m^eb^ naama sotena suta.m. ^b^muta.m^eb^ naama ghaanena ghaayita.m, jivhaaya saayita.m, kaayena phu.t.tha.m. ^b^vi~n~naata.m^eb^ naama manasaa vi~n~naata.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ tiihaakaarehi ``adi.t.tha.m di.t.tha.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa -- pubbevassa hoti ``musaa bha.nissa''nti, bha.nantassa hoti ``musaa bha.naamii''ti, bha.nitassa hoti ``musaa mayaa bha.nita''nti.

[03]catuuhaakaarehi ^a^M0.0003^ea^ ``adi.t.tha.m di.t.tha.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa -- pubbevassa hoti ``musaa bha.nissa''nti, bha.nantassa hoti ``musaa bha.naamii''ti, bha.nitassa hoti ``musaa mayaa bha.nita''nti, vinidhaaya di.t.thi.m.

[03]pa~ncahaakaarehi ``adi.t.tha.m di.t.tha.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa -- pubbevassa hoti ``musaa bha.nissa''nti, bha.nantassa hoti ``musaa bha.naamii''ti, bha.nitassa hoti ``musaa mayaa bha.nita''nti, vinidhaaya di.t.thi.m, vinidhaaya khanti.m.

[03]chahaakaarehi ^a^P4.0003^ea^ ``adi.t.tha.m di.t.tha.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa -- pubbevassa hoti ``musaa bha.nissa''nti, bha.nantassa hoti ``musaa bha.naamii''ti, bha.nitassa hoti ``musaa mayaa bha.nita''nti ^a^T2.0156^ea^, vinidhaaya di.t.thi.m, vinidhaaya khanti.m, vinidhaaya ruci.m.

[03]sattahaakaarehi ``adi.t.tha.m di.t.tha.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa'' -- pubbevassa hoti ``musaa bha.nissa''nti, bha.nantassa hoti ``musaa bha.naamii''ti, bha.nitassa hoti ``musaa mayaa bha.nita''nti, vinidhaaya di.t.thi.m, vinidhaaya khanti.m, vinidhaaya ruci.m, vinidhaaya bhaava.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ tiihaakaarehi ``assuta.m suta.m me''ti...pe0... amuta.m muta.m meti...pe0... avi~n~naata.m ^a^V0.0004^ea^ vi~n~naata.m meti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa -- pubbevassa hoti ``musaa bha.nissa''nti, bha.nantassa hoti ``musaa bha.naamii''ti, bha.nitassa hoti ``musaa mayaa bha.nita''nti.

[03]catuuhaakaarehi...pe0... pa~ncahaakaarehi...pe0... chahaakaarehi...pe0... sattahaakaarehi ``avi~n~naata.m vi~n~naata.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa -- pubbevassa hoti ``musaa bha.nissa''nti, bha.nantassa hoti ``musaa bha.naamii''ti, bha.nitassa hoti ``musaa mayaa bha.nitanti, vinidhaaya di.t.thi.m, vinidhaaya khanti.m, vinidhaaya ruci.m, vinidhaaya bhaava.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ tiihaakaarehi ``adi.t.tha.m di.t.tha~nca me suta~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0... tiihaakaarehi ``adi.t.tha.m di.t.tha~nca me muta~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0... tiihaakaarehi ``adi.t.tha.m di.t.tha~nca me vi~n~naata~ncaa''ti ^a^T2.0157^ea^ sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa ^a^M0.0004^ea^...pe0... tiihaakaarehi adi.t.tha.m ``di.t.tha~nca me suta~nca muta~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi adi.t.tha.m ``di.t.tha~nca me suta~nca vi~n~naata~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi adi.t.tha.m ``di.t.tha~nca me suta~nca muta~nca vi~n~naata~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0....

[03]tiihaakaarehi assuta.m ``suta~nca me muta~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi assuta.m ``suta~nca me vi~n~naata~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi assuta.m ``suta~nca me di.t.tha~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0... tiihaakaarehi assuta.m ``suta~nca me muta~nca vi~n~naata~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi assuta.m ``suta~nca me muta~nca di.t.tha~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi assuta.m ``suta~nca me muta~nca vi~n~naata~nca di.t.tha~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0....

[03]tiihaakaarehi amuta.m ``muta~nca me vi~n~naata~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi amuta.m ``muta~nca me di.t.tha~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi amuta.m ``muta~nca me suta~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0... tiihaakaarehi amuta.m ``muta~nca me vi~n~naata~nca di.t.tha~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi amuta.m ``muta~nca me vi~n~naata~nca suta~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi amuta.m ``muta~nca me vi~n~naata~nca di.t.tha~nca suta~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0....

[03]tiihaakaarehi ^a^V0.0005^ea^ avi~n~naata.m ``vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi avi~n~naata.m ``vi~n~naata~nca me suta~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi avi~n~naata.m ``vi~n~naata~nca me muta~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0... tiihaakaarehi avi~n~naata.m ``vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~nca suta~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi avi~n~naata.m ``vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~nca muta~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi avi~n~naata.m ``vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~nca suta~nca muta~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti ^a^T2.0158^ea^ paacittiyassa...pe0....

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ tiihaakaarehi di.t.tha.m ``adi.t.tha.m me''ti...pe0... suta.m ``assuta.m me''ti...pe0... muta.m ``amuta.m me''ti...pe0... vi~n~naata.m ``avi~n~naata.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0....

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ tiihaakaarehi di.t.tha.m ``suta.m me''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi di.t.tha.m ``muta.m ^a^T2.0159^ea^ me''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi di.t.tha.m ``vi~n~naata.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti ^a^M0.0005^ea^ paacittiyassa...pe0... tiihaakaarehi di.t.tha.m ``suta~nca me muta~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi di.t.tha.m ``suta~nca me vi~n~naata~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi di.t.tha.m ``suta~nca me muta~nca ^a^P4.0004^ea^ vi~n~naata~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0....

[03]tiihaakaarehi suta.m ``muta.m me''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi suta.m ``vi~n~naata.m me''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi suta.m ``di.t.tha.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0... tiihaakaarehi suta.m ``muta~nca me vi~n~naata~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi suta.m ``muta~nca me di.t.tha~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi suta.m ``muta~nca me vi~n~naata~nca di.t.tha~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0....

[03]tiihaakaarehi muta.m ``vi~n~naata.m me''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi muta.m ``di.t.tha.m me''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi muta.m ``suta.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0... tiihaakaarehi muta.m ``vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi muta.m ``vi~n~naata~nca me suta~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi muta.m ``vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~nca suta~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0....

[03]tiihaakaarehi vi~n~naata.m ``di.t.tha.m me''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi vi~n~naata.m ``suta.m me''ti ^a^V0.0006^ea^ ...pe0... tiihaakaarehi vi~n~naata.m ``muta.m me''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0... tiihaakaarehi vi~n~naata.m ``di.t.tha~nca me suta~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi vi~n~naata.m ``di.t.tha~nca me muta~ncaa''ti...pe0... tiihaakaarehi vi~n~naata.m ``di.t.tha~nca me suta~nca muta~ncaa''ti sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa...pe0....

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ tiihaakaarehi di.t.the vematiko di.t.tha.m nokappeti, di.t.tha.m nassarati ^a^T2.0160^ea^, di.t.tha.m pamu.t.tho hoti...pe0... sute vematiko suta.m nokappeti, suta.m nassarati, suta.m pamu.t.tho hoti...pe0... mute vematiko muta.m nokappeti, muta.m nassarati, muta.m pamu.t.tho hoti...pe0... vi~n~naate vematiko vi~n~naata.m nokappeti, vi~n~naata.m nassarati, vi~n~naata.m pamu.t.tho hoti... vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~ncaati...pe0... vi~n~naata.m pamu.t.tho hoti vi~n~naata~nca me suta~ncaati...pe0... vi~n~naata.m pamu.t.tho hoti; vi~n~naata~nca me muta~ncaati...pe0... vi~n~naata.m pamu.t.tho hoti; vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~nca suta~ncaati...pe0... vi~n~naata.m pamu.t.tho ^a^M0.0006^ea^ hoti; vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~nca muta~ncaati...pe0... vi~n~naata.m pamu.t.tho hoti; vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~nca suta~nca muta~ncaati sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ catuuhaakaarehi...pe0... pa~ncahaakaarehi...pe0... chahaakaarehi...pe0... sattahaakaarehi...pe0... vi~n~naata.m pamu.t.tho hoti, vi~n~naata~nca me di.t.tha~nca suta~nca muta~ncaati sampajaanamusaa bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa -- pubbevassa hoti ``musaa bha.nissa''nti, bha.nantassa hoti ``musaa bha.naamii''ti, bha.nitassa hoti ``musaa ^a^T2.0161^ea^ mayaa bha.nita''nti, vinidhaaya di.t.thi.m, vinidhaaya khanti.m, vinidhaaya ruci.m, vinidhaaya bhaava.m.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ anaapatti davaa bha.nati, ravaa bha.nati {davaaya bha.nati, ravaaya bha.nati (syaa0)}. ^b^``davaa bha.nati^eb^ naama sahasaa bha.nati. ^b^ravaa bha.nati^eb^ naama `a~n~na.m bha.nissaamii'ti a~n~na.m bha.nati''. ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] musaavaadasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0162^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame ^a^V0.0007^ea^. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu pesalehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m bha.n.dantaa {bha.n.dentaa (itipi)} pesale bhikkhuu omasanti -- jaatiyaapi, naamenapi, gottenapi, kammenapi, sippenapi, aabaadhenapi, li"ngenapi, kilesenapi, aapattiyaapi; hiinenapi akkosena khu.msenti vambhenti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu pesalehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m bha.n.dantaa pesale bhikkhuu ^a^P4.0005^ea^ omasissanti -- jaatiyaapi, naamenapi, gottenapi, kammenapi, sippenapi, aabaadhenapi, li"ngenapi, kilesenapi, aapattiyaapi; hiinenapi akkosena khu.msessanti vambhessantii''ti!

[03]atha kho te bhikkhuu chabbaggiye bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, pesalehi ^a^M0.0007^ea^ bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m bha.n.dantaa pesale bhikkhuu omasatha -- jaatiyaapi...pe0... hiinenapi akkosena khu.msetha vambhethaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, pesalehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m bha.n.dantaa pesale bhikkhuu omasissatha -- jaatiyaapi...pe0... hiinenapi akkosena khu.msessatha vambhessatha ^a^T2.0163^ea^! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, takkasilaaya.m {takkasiilaaya.m (ka0)} a~n~natarassa braahma.nassa nandivisaalo naama baliibaddo {balivaddo (sii0), balibaddo (syaa0)} ahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, nandivisaalo baliibaddo ta.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``gaccha tva.m, braahma.na, se.t.thinaa saddhi.m sahassena abbhuta.m karohi -- mayha.m baliibaddo saka.tasata.m atibaddha.m pava.t.tessatii''ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, so braahma.no se.t.thinaa saddhi.m sahassena abbhuta.m akaasi -- mayha.m baliibaddo saka.tasata.m atibaddha.m pava.t.tessatiiti. atha kho, bhikkhave, so braahma.no saka.tasata.m atibandhitvaa nandivisaala.m baliibadda.m yu~njitvaa etadavoca -- ``gaccha, kuu.ta {a~ncha kuu.ta (sii0 syaa0)}, vahassu, kuu.taa'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, nandivisaalo baliibaddo tattheva a.t.thaasi. atha kho, bhikkhave, so braahma.no sahassena paraajito pajjhaayi. atha kho, bhikkhave, nandivisaalo baliibaddo ta.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``kissa tva.m, braahma.na, pajjhaayasii''ti? `tathaa hi panaaha.m, bho, tayaa sahassena paraajito''ti. `kissa pana ma.m tva.m, braahma.na, akuu.ta.m kuu.tavaadena paapesi? gaccha tva.m, braahma.na, se.t.thinaa saddhi.m dviihi sahassehi abbhuta.m karohi -- ``mayha.m baliibaddo saka.tasata.m atibaddha.m pava.t.tessatii''ti. ``maa ca ma.m akuu.ta.m kuu.tavaadena paapesii''ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, so braahma.no se.t.thinaa ^a^T2.0164^ea^ saddhi.m dviihi sahassehi abbhuta.m akaasi -- ``mayha.m baliibaddo saka.tasata.m atibaddha.m pava.t.tessatii''ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, so braahma.no ^a^V0.0008^ea^ saka.tasata.m atibandhitvaa nandivisaala.m baliibadda.m yu~njitvaa etadavoca -- ``accha, bhadra, vahassu, bhadraa''ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, nandivisaalo baliibaddo saka.tasata.m atibaddha.m pava.t.tesi.
[21] {jaa0 1.1.28 nandivisaalajaatakepi, tattha pana manu~n~nasaddo dissati} ``manaapameva ^a^M0.0008^ea^ bhaaseyya, naa, manaapa.m kudaacana.m.
[27] manaapa.m bhaasamaanassa, garu.m bhaara.m udabbahi.
[22] dhana~nca na.m alaabhesi, tena ca, ttamano ahuuti..

[03]``tadaapi ^a^P4.0006^ea^ me, bhikkhave, amanaapaa khu.msanaa vambhanaa. kima"nga.m pana etarahi manaapaa bhavissati khu.msanaa vambhanaa? neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0.... ``eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ^b^``omasavaade paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ^b^omasavaado^eb^ naama dasahi aakaarehi omasati -- jaatiyaapi, naamenapi, gottenapi, kammenapi, sippenapi, aabaadhenapi, li"ngenapi, kilesenapi, aapattiyaapi, akkosenapi.

[03]^b^jaati^eb^ naama dve jaatiyo -- hiinaa ca jaati ukka.t.thaa ca jaati. ^b^hiinaa^eb^ naama jaati -- ca.n.daalajaati, venajaati, nesaadajaati, rathakaarajaati, pukkusajaati. esaa hiinaa naama jaati. ^b^ukka.t.thaa^eb^ naama jaati -- khattiyajaati, braahma.najaati. esaa ukka.t.thaa naama jaati.

upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m itthi.m etadavoca -- ``sace te, bhagini, agaru, vaseyyaama ekaratta.m aavasathaagaare''ti. ``vaseyyaatha, bhante''ti. a~n~nepi addhikaa yena saa itthii tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m itthi.m etadavocu.m -- ``sace te, ayye, agaru vaseyyaama ekaratta.m aavasathaagaare''ti ^a^P4.0018^ea^. ``eso kho ayyo sama.no pa.thama.m upagato; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``ayyo, bhante, imehi manussehi aaki.n.no na phaasu viharissati. saadhaaha.m, bhante, ayyassa ^a^T2.0199^ea^ ma~ncaka.m abbhantara.m pa~n~napeyya''nti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa anuruddho tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho saa itthii aayasmato anuruddhassa ma~ncaka.m abbhantara.m pa~n~napetvaa ala"nkatappa.tiyattaa gandhagandhinii yenaayasmaa anuruddho tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``ayyo, bhante, abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko, aha.m camhi abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa. saadhaaha.m, bhante, ayyassa pajaapati bhaveyya''nti. eva.m vutte aayasmaa anuruddho tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho saa itthii aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``ayyo, bhante, abhiruupo ^a^V0.0030^ea^ dassaniiyo paasaadiko, aha~ncamhi abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa. saadhu, bhante, ayyo ma~nceva pa.ticchatu {sampa.ticchatu (syaa0)} sabba~nca saapateyya''nti. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa anuruddho tu.nhii ahosi. atha kho saa itthii saa.taka.m nikkhipitvaa aayasmato anuruddhassa purato ca"nkamatipi ti.t.thatipi nisiidatipi seyyampi kappeti. atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho indriyaani okkhipitvaa ta.m itthi.m neva olokesi napi aalapi. atha kho ^a^M0.0030^ea^ saa itthii -- ``acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho! bahuu me manussaa satenapi sahassenapi pahi.nanti. aya.m pana sama.no -- mayaa saama.m yaaciyamaano -- na icchati ma~nceva pa.ticchitu.m sabba~nca saapateyya''nti saa.taka.m nivaasetvaa aayasmato anuruddhassa paadesu sirasaa ^a^T2.0200^ea^ nipatitvaa aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m yaaha.m evamakaasi.m. tassaa me, bhante, ayyo accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha tva.m, bhagini, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m yaa tva.m evamakaasi. yato ca kho tva.m, bhagini, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m ^a^P4.0019^ea^ pa.tikarosi, ta.m te maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vuddhi hesaa, bhagini, ariyassa vinaye yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti aayati~nca sa.mvara.m aapajjatii''ti.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ maatugaame maatugaamasa~n~nii sahaseyya.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. maatugaame vematiko sahaseyya.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. maatugaame amaatugaamasa~n~nii sahaseyya.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]upa.d.dhacchanne upa.d.dhaparicchanne, aapatti dukka.tassa. yakkhiyaa vaa petiyaa vaa pa.n.dakena vaa tiracchaanagatitthiyaa vaa sahaseyya.m kappeti, aapatti dukka.tassa. amaatugaame maatugaamasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. amaatugaame vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. amaatugaame amaatugaamasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ anaapatti ^a^V0.0032^ea^ sabbacchanne sabbaaparicchanne, sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne {anaapatti sabbaacchanne sabbaaparicchanne, (sii0)}, yebhuyyena acchanne, yebhuyyena aparicchanne, maatugaame nipanne bhikkhu nisiidati ^a^M0.0032^ea^, bhikkhu nipanne maatugaamo nisiidati, ubho vaa nisiidanti, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] dutiyasahaseyyasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0203^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa udaayii saavatthiya.m kuluupako hoti, bahukaani kulaani upasa"nkamati. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena a~n~natara.m kula.m tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena ghara.nii nivesanadvaare nisinnaa hoti, gharasu.nhaa aavasathadvaare nisinnaa hoti. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii yena ghara.nii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ghara.niyaa upaka.n.nake dhamma.m desesi. atha kho gharasu.nhaaya etadahosi -- ``ki nu kho so sama.no sassuyaa jaaro udaahu obhaasatii''ti?

[03]atha kho aayasmaa udaayii ghara.niyaa upaka.n.nake dhamma.m desetvaa yena gharasu.nhaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa gharasu.nhaaya upaka.n.nake dhamma.m desesi. atha kho ghara.niyaa etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho so sama.no gharasu.nhaaya jaaro udaahu obhaasatii''ti ^a^P4.0021^ea^? atha kho aayasmaa udaayii gharasu.nhaaya upaka.n.nake dhamma.m desetvaa pakkaami. atha kho ghara.nii gharasu.nha.m etadavoca -- ``he je, ki.m te eso sama.no avocaa''ti? ``dhamma.m me, ayye, desesi''. ``ayyaaya pana ki.m avocaa''ti? ``mayhampi dhamma.m desesii''ti. taa ^a^T2.0204^ea^ ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyo udaayii maatugaamassa upaka.n.nake dhamma.m desessati! nanu naama vissa.t.thena viva.tena dhammo desetabbo''ti?

[03]assosu.m kho bhikkhuu taasa.m itthiina.m ujjhaayantiina.m khiyyantiina.m vipaacentiina.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa udaayii maatugaamassa dhamma.m desessatii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu ^a^M0.0033^ea^ aayasmanta.m udaayi.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, udaayi, maatugaamassa dhamma.m desesii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi ^a^V0.0033^ea^ naama tva.m, moghapurisa, maatugaamassa dhamma.m desessasi. neta.m moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu maatugaamassa dhamma.m deseyya paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena upaasikaa bhikkhuu passitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``i"nghaayyaa dhamma.m desethaa''ti. ``na, bhaginii, kappati maatugaamassa dhamma.m desetu''nti. ``i"nghaayyaa chappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m desetha, sakkaa ettakenapi dhammo a~n~naatu''nti. ``na, bhaginii, kappati maatugaamassa dhamma.m desetu''nti. kukkuccaayantaa na desesu.m. upaasikaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyaa amhehi yaaciyamaanaa dhamma.m na desessantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu taasa.m upaasikaana.m ^a^T2.0205^ea^ ujjhaayantiina.m khiyyantiina.m vipaacentiina.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa chappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m desetu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhuu maatugaamassa uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m deseyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m ^a^P4.0022^ea^ bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu -- ``bhagavataa anu~n~naata.m maatugaamassa chappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m desetu''nti te avi~n~nu.m purisaviggaha.m upanisiidaapetvaa maatugaamassa uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m desenti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu avi~n~nu.m purisaviggaha.m upanisiidaapetvaa maatugaamassa uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m desessantii''ti!

[03]atha ^a^M0.0034^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu chabbaggiye bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, avi~n~nu.m purisaviggaha.m upanisiidaapetvaa maatugaamassa uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m desethaa''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi ^a^V0.0034^ea^ buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, avi~n~nu.m purisaviggaha.m upanisiidaapetvaa maatugaamassa uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m desessatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha ^a^T2.0206^ea^ --
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu maatugaamassa uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m deseyya, a~n~natra vi~n~nunaa purisaviggahena, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 64^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^maatugaamo^eb^ naama manussitthii; na yakkhii na petii na tiracchaanagataa; vi~n~nuu, pa.tibalaa subhaasitadubbhaasita.m du.t.thullaadu.t.thulla.m aajaanitu.m.
[03]^b^uttarichappa~ncavaacaahii^eb^ti atirekachappa~ncavaacaahi.
[03]^b^dhammo^eb^ naama buddhabhaasito, saavakabhaasito, isibhaasito, devataabhaasito, atthuupasa~nhito, dhammuupasa~nhito.
[03]^b^deseyyaa^eb^ti padena deseti, pade pade aapatti paacittiyassa. akkharaaya deseti, akkharakkharaaya aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^a~n~natra vi~n~nunaa purisaviggahenaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa vi~n~nu.m purisaviggaha.m. vi~n~nuu naama purisaviggaho, pa.tibalo hoti subhaasitadubbhaasita.m du.t.thullaadu.t.thulla.m aajaanitu.m.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ maatugaame maatugaamasa~n~nii uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m deseti, a~n~natra vi~n~nunaa purisaviggahena, aapatti paacittiyassa. maatugaame vematiko uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m deseti, a~n~natra vi~n~nunaa purisaviggahena, aapatti paacittiyassa. maatugaame amaatugaamasa~n~nii uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m deseti, a~n~natra vi~n~nunaa purisaviggahena, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]yakkhiyaa ^a^M0.0035^ea^ ^a^V0.0035^ea^ vaa petiyaa vaa pa.n.dakassa vaa ^a^P4.0023^ea^ tiracchaanagatamanussaviggahitthiyaa vaa uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi ^a^T2.0207^ea^ dhamma.m deseti, a~n~natra vi~n~nunaa purisaviggahena, aapatti dukka.tassa. amaatugaame maatugaamasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. amaatugaame vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. amaatugaame amaatugaamasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ anaapatti vi~n~nunaa purisaviggahena, chappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m deseti, uunakachappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m deseti, u.t.thahitvaa puna nisiiditvaa deseti, maatugaamo u.t.thahitvaa puna nisiidati tasmi.m deseti, a~n~nassa maatugaamassa deseti, pa~nha.m pucchati, pa~nha.m pu.t.tho katheti, a~n~nassatthaaya bha.nanta.m maatugaamo su.naati, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] dhammadesanaasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ {paaraa0 193} tena ^a^T2.0208^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa sandi.t.thaa sambhattaa bhikkhuu vaggumudaaya nadiyaa tiire vassa.m upagacchi.msu. tena kho pana samayena vajjii dubbhikkhaa hoti -- dviihitikaa seta.t.thikaa salaakaavuttaa, na sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``etarahi kho vajjii dubbhikkhaa -- dviihitikaa seta.t.thikaa salaakaavuttaa, na sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. kena nu kho maya.m upaayena samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vaseyyaama, na ca pi.n.dakena kilameyyaamaa''ti? ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``handa maya.m, aavuso, gihiina.m kammanta.m adhi.t.thema. eva.m te amhaaka.m daatu.m ma~n~nissanti. eva.m maya.m samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasissaama, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamissaamaa''ti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``ala.m, aavuso, ki.m gihiina.m kammanta.m adhi.t.thitena? handa maya.m, aavuso, gihiina.m duuteyya.m haraama. eva.m te amhaaka.m daatu.m ma~n~nissanti. eva.m maya.m samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasissaama, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamissaamaa''ti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``ala.m, aavuso; ^a^M0.0036^ea^ ki.m gihiina.m kammanta.m adhi.t.thitena! ki.m gihiina.m duuteyya.m ha.tena! handa maya.m, aavuso, gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasissaama ^a^T2.0209^ea^ -- `asuko bhikkhu pa.thamassa jhaanassa ^a^P4.0024^ea^ laabhii, asuko bhikkhu dutiyassa jhaanassa laabhii, asuko bhikkhu tatiyassa jhaanassa laabhii, asuko bhikkhu catutthassa jhaanassa ^a^V0.0036^ea^ laabhii, asuko bhikkhu sotaapanno, asuko bhikkhu sakadaagaamii, asuko bhikkhu anaagaamii, asuko bhikkhu arahaa, asuko bhikkhu tevijjo, asuko bhikkhu cha.labhi~n~noti. eva.m te amhaaka.m daatu.m ma~n~nissanti. eva.m maya.m samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasissaama, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamissaamaa''ti. eso yeva kho, aavuso, seyyo, yo amhaaka.m gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.no bhaasito''ti.

[03]atha kho te bhikkhuu gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasi.msu -- ``asuko bhikkhu pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhii...pe0... asuko bhikkhu cha.labhi~n~no''ti. atha kho te manussaa -- ``laabhaa vata no, suladdha.m vata no, yesa.m no evaruupaa bhikkhuu vassa.m upagataa, na vata no ito pubbe evaruupaa bhikkhuu vassa.m upagataa, yathayime bhikkhuu siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa''ti. te na taadisaani bhojanaani attanaa bhu~njanti, maataapituuna.m denti puttadaarassa denti daasakammakaraporisassa denti mittaamaccaana.m denti ~naatisaalohitaana.m denti yaadisaani bhikkhuuna.m denti. na taadisaani khaadaniiyaani saayaniiyaani paanaani attanaa khaadanti saayanti pivanti {attanaa pivanti (syaa0 ka0)} maataapituuna.m denti puttadaarassa denti daasakammakaraporisassa denti mittaamaccaana.m denti ~naatisaalohitaana.m denti ^a^T2.0210^ea^, yaadisaani bhikkhuuna.m denti. atha kho te bhikkhuu va.n.navaa ahesu.m pii.nindriyaa pasannamukhava.n.naa vippasannachaviva.n.naa.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ aaci.n.na.m kho paneta.m vassa.mvu.t.thaana.m bhikkhuuna.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu vassa.mvu.t.thaa temaasaccayena senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena vesaalii tena pakkami.msu. anupubbena yena vesaalii mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. tena kho pana samayena disaasu vassa.mvu.t.thaa bhikkhuu kisaa honti luukhaa dubba.n.naa ^a^M0.0037^ea^ uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa dhamanisanthatagattaa. vaggumudaatiiriyaa pana bhikkhuu va.n.navaa honti pii.nindriyaa pasannamukhava.n.naa vippasannachaviva.n.naa. aaci.n.na.m kho paneta.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammoditu.m. atha kho bhagavaa vaggumudaatiiriye bhikkhuu etadavoca ^a^P4.0025^ea^ -- ``kacci, bhikkhave, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kacci samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasittha, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamitthaa''ti? ``khamaniiya.m bhagavaa, yaapaniiya.m bhagavaa. samaggaa ca maya.m, bhante, sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasimhaa, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamimhaa''ti. jaanantaapi tathaagataa pucchanti, jaanantaapi na pucchanti. kaala.m viditvaa pucchanti ^a^V0.0037^ea^, kaala.m viditvaa na pucchanti. atthasa~nhita.m tathaagataa pucchanti, no anatthasa~nhita.m. anatthasa~nhite setughaato tathaagataana.m. dviihaakaarehi buddhaa ^a^T2.0211^ea^ bhagavanto bhikkhuu pa.tipucchanti -- dhamma.m vaa desessaama, saavakaana.m vaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaamaati.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa vaggumudaatiiriye bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``yathaa katha.m pana tumhe, bhikkhave, samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasittha, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamitthaa''ti? atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``kacci pana vo, bhikkhave, bhuuta''nti? ``bhuuta.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, bhikkhave, udarassa kaara.naa gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasissatha! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhamma.m aaroceyya bhuutasmi.m, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^anupasampanno^eb^ naama bhikkhu~nca bhikkhuni~nca .thapetvaa, avaseso anupasampanno naama.

[03] {paaraa0 198} ^b^uttarimanussadhammo^eb^ naama jhaana.m, vimokkho, samaadhi, samaapatti, ~naa.nadassana.m, maggabhaavanaa, phalasacchikiriyaa, kilesappahaana.m, viniivara.nataa cittassa, su~n~naagaare abhirati.
[03] {paaraa0 199} ^b^jhaana^eb^nti ^a^M0.0038^ea^ pa.thama.m jhaana.m, dutiya.m jhaana.m, tatiya.m jhaana.m, catuttha.m jhaana.m.
[03] {paaraa0 199} ^b^vimokkho^eb^ti su~n~nato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appa.nihito vimokkho.
[03] {paaraa0 199} ^b^samaadhii^eb^ti su~n~nato samaadhi, animitto samaadhi, appa.nihito ^a^T2.0212^ea^ samaadhi.
[03] {paaraa0 199} ^b^samaapattii^eb^ti su~n~nataa samaapatti, animittaa samaapatti, appa.nihitaa samaapatti.
[03] {paaraa0 199} ^b^~naa.nadassana^eb^nti ^a^P4.0026^ea^ ^a^V0.0038^ea^ tisso vijjaa.
[03] {paaraa0 199} ^b^maggabhaavanaa^eb^ti cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa, cattaaro sammappadhaanaa, cattaaro iddhipaadaa, pa~ncindriyaani, pa~nca balaani, satta bojjha"ngaa, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo.

[03] {paaraa0 199} ^b^phalasacchikiriyaa^eb^ti sotaapattiphalassa sacchikiriyaa, sakadaagaamiphalassa sacchikiriyaa, anaagaamiphalassa sacchikiriyaa, arahattassa {arahattaphalassa (syaa0)} sacchikiriyaa.

[03] {paaraa0 199} ^b^viniivara.nataa cittassaa^eb^ti raagaa citta.m viniivara.nataa, dosaa citta.m viniivara.nataa, mohaa citta.m viniivara.nataa.

[03] {paaraa0 199} ^b^su~n~naagaare abhiratii^eb^ti pa.thamena jhaanena su~n~naagaare abhirati, dutiyena jhaanena su~n~naagaare abhirati, tatiyena jhaanena su~n~naagaare abhirati, catutthena jhaanena su~n~naagaare abhirati.
[03] 71^b^.^eb^ ^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapajji''nti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapajjaamii''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapanno''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti ^a^M0.0039^ea^ anupasampannassa -- ``pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhimhii''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti ^a^V0.0039^ea^ anupasampannassa -- ``pa.thamassa jhaanassa vasimhii''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``pa.thama.m ^a^T2.0213^ea^ jhaana.m sacchikata.m mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``dutiya.m jhaana.m... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; catutthassa jhaanassa laabhimhi, vasimhi; catuttha.m jhaana.m sacchikata.m mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``su~n~nata.m vimokkha.m... animitta.m vimokkha.m... appa.nihita.m vimokkha.m... su~n~nata.m samaadhi.m... animitta.m samaadhi.m... appa.nihita.m samaadhi.m samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; appa.nihitassa samaadhissa laabhimhi, vasimhi; appa.nihito samaadhi sacchikato mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``su~n~nata.m samaapatti.m... animitta.m samaapatti.m... appa.nihita.m samaapatti.m samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; appa.nihitaaya samaapattiyaa laabhimhi, vasimhi; appa.nihitaa samaapatti sacchikataa mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``tisso vijjaa samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; tissanna.m vijjaana.m laabhimhi, vasimhi; tisso vijjaa sacchikataa mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``cattaaro ^a^P4.0027^ea^ satipa.t.thaane... cattaaro sammappadhaane... cattaaro iddhipaade samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m laabhimhi, vasimhi; cattaaro iddhipaadaa ^a^T2.0214^ea^ sacchikataa mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``pa~ncindriyaani... pa~nca balaani samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami ^a^V0.0040^ea^, samaapanno; pa~ncanna.m balaana.m laabhimhi, vasimhi; pa~nca balaani sacchikataani mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti ^a^M0.0040^ea^ anupasampannassa -- ``satta bojjha"nge samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m laabhimhi, vasimhi; satta bojjha"ngaa sacchikataa mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa laabhimhi, vasimhi; ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sacchikato mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``sotaapattiphala.m... sakadaagaamiphala.m... anaagaamiphala.m... arahatta.m samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; arahattassa laabhimhi, vasimhi; arahatta.m {arahattaphala.m (syaa0)} sacchikata.m mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``raago me catto... doso me catto... moho me catto, vanto, mutto, pahiino, pa.tinissa.t.tho, ukkhe.tito ^a^T2.0215^ea^, samukkhe.tito''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``raagaa me citta.m viniivara.na.m... dosaa me citta viniivara.na.m... mohaa me citta.m viniivara.na''nti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``su~n~naagaare pa.thama.m jhaana.m... dutiya.m jhaana.m... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; su~n~naagaare catutthassa jhaanassa laabhimhi, vasimhi; su~n~naagaare catuttha.m jhaana.m sacchikata.m mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``pa.thama~nca jhaana.m dutiya~nca jhaana.m samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; pa.thamassa ca jhaanassa dutiyassa ca jhaanassa laabhimhi, vasimhi; pa.thama~nca jhaana.m dutiya~nca jhaana.m sacchikata.m mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^aaroceyyaa^eb^ti anupasampannassa -- ``pa.thama~nca jhaana.m su~n~nata~nca samaapatti.m... animitta~nca samaapatti.m... appa.nihita~nca samaapatti.m samaapajji.m, samaapajjaami, samaapanno; pa.thamassa ca jhaanassa appa.nihitaaya ca samaapattiyaa laabhimhi, vasimhi; pa.thama~nca jhaana.m appa.nihitaa ca samaapatti sacchikataa mayaa''ti bha.nantassa aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^vihesako^eb^ naama sa"nghamajjhe vatthusmi.m vaa aapattiyaa vaa anuyu~njiiyamaano ta.m na kathetukaamo ta.m na ugghaa.tetukaamo tu.nhiibhuuto sa"ngha.m viheseti. eso vihesako naama.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ aaropite a~n~navaadake sa"nghamajjhe vatthusmi.m vaa aapattiyaa vaa anuyu~njiiyamaano ta.m na kathetukaamo ta.m na ugghaa.tetukaamo a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati -- ``ko aapanno, ki.m aapanno, kismi.m aapanno, katha.m aapanno, ka.m bha.natha, ki.m bha.nathaa''ti, aapatti dukka.tassa. aaropite vihesake sa"nghamajjhe vatthusmi.m vaa aapattiyaa vaa anuyu~njiiyamaano ta.m na kathetukaamo ta.m na ugghaa.tetukaamo tu.nhiibhuuto sa"ngha.m viheseti, aapatti dukka.tassa. ropite a~n~navaadake sa"nghamajjhe vatthusmi.m vaa aapattiyaa vaa anuyu~njiiyamaano ta.m na kathetukaamo ta.m na ugghaa.tetukaamo a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati -- ``ko aapanno, ki.m aapanno, kismi.m aapanno, katha.m aapanno, ka.m bha.natha, ki.m bha.nathaa''ti, aapatti paacittiyassa ^a^T2.0239^ea^. ropite vihesake sa"nghamajjhe vatthusmi.m vaa aapattiyaa vaa anuyu~njiiyamaano ta.m na kathetukaamo ta.m na ugghaa.tetukaamo tu.nhiibhuuto sa"ngha.m viheseti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0240^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~napeti bhattaani ca uddisati. tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhuumajakaa {mettiyabhuummajakaa (sii0 syaa0)} bhikkhuu navakaa ceva honti appapu~n~naa ca ^a^P4.0038^ea^. yaani sa"nghassa laamakaani senaasanaani taani tesa.m paapu.nanti laamakaani ca bhattaani. te aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m bhikkhuu ujjhaapenti -- ``chandaaya dabbo mallaputto senaasana.m pa~n~napeti, chandaaya ca bhattaani uddisatii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m bhikkhuu ujjhaapessantii''ti...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dabba.m mallaputta.m bhikkhuu ujjhaapethaa''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, dabba.m mallaputta.m bhikkhuu ujjhaapessatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]^b^jaanaati^eb^ ^a^M0.0063^ea^ naama vu.d.dhoti jaanaati, gilaanoti jaanaati, sa"nghena dinnoti jaanaati.
[03]^b^anupakhajjaa^eb^ti anupavisitvaa.

[03]^b^seyya.m kappeyyaa^eb^ti ma~ncassa vaa pii.thassa vaa pavisantassa vaa nikkhamantassa vaa upacaare seyya.m santharati vaa santharaapeti vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa. abhinisiidati vaa abhinipajjati vaa, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^etadeva paccaya.m karitvaa ana~n~na^eb^nti na a~n~no koci paccayo hoti anupakhajja seyya.m kappetu.m.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ sa"nghike sa"nghikasa~n~nii anupakhajja seyya.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. sa"nghike vematiko anupakhajja seyya.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. sa"nghike puggalikasa~n~nii anupakhajja seyya.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]ma~ncassa vaa pii.thassa vaa pavisantassa vaa nikkhamantassa vaa upacaara.m .thapetvaa seyya.m santharati vaa santharaapeti vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa. abhinisiidati vaa abhinipajjati vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa. vihaarassa upacaare vaa upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m vaa ma.n.dape vaa rukkhamuule vaa ajjhokaase vaa seyya.m santharati vaa santharaapeti vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa. abhinisiidati vaa abhinippajjati vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa. puggalike sa"nghikasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. puggalike vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. puggalike puggalikasa~n~nii a~n~nassa puggalike aapatti dukka.tassa ^a^T2.0252^ea^. attano puggalike anaapatti.
[03] 123^b^.^eb^ anaapatti gilaano pavisati, siitena vaa u.nhena vaa pii.lito pavisati, aapadaasu, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] anupakhajjasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0253^ea^ ^a^P4.0044^ea^ ^a^V0.0065^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena sattarasavaggiyaa bhikkhuu a~n~natara.m paccantima.m mahaavihaara.m pa.tisa"nkharonti -- ``idha maya.m vassa.m vasissaamaa''ti ^a^M0.0064^ea^. addasa.msu kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sattarasavaggiye bhikkhuu vihaara.m pa.tisa"nkharonte. disvaana evamaaha.msu -- ``ime, aavuso, sattarasavaggiyaa bhikkhuu vihaara.m pa.tisa"nkharonti. handa ne vu.t.thaapessaamaa''ti! ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``aagamethaavuso, yaava pa.tisa"nkharonti; pa.tisa"nkhate vu.t.thaapessaamaa''ti.

[03]atha kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sattarasavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``u.t.thethaavuso, amhaaka.m vihaaro paapu.naatii''ti. ``nanu, aavuso, pa.tikacceva {pa.tigacceva (sii0)} aacikkhitabba.m, maya~nca~n~na.m pa.tisa"nkhareyyaamaa''ti. ``nanu, aavuso, sa"nghiko vihaaro''ti? ``aamaavuso, sa"nghiko vihaaro''ti. ``u.t.thethaavuso, amhaaka.m vihaaro paapu.naatii''ti. ``mahallako, aavuso, vihaaro. tumhepi vasatha, mayampi vasissaamaa''ti. ``u.t.thethaavuso, amhaaka.m vihaaro paapu.naatii''ti kupitaa anattamanaa giivaaya.m gahetvaa nikka.d.dhanti. te nikka.d.dhiiyamaanaa rodanti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``kissa tumhe, aavuso, rodathaa''ti? ``ime, aavuso, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu kupitaa anattamanaa amhe sa"nghikaa vihaaraa nikka.d.dhantii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti ^a^T2.0254^ea^ khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu kupitaa anattamanaa bhikkhuu sa"nghikaa vihaaraa nikka.d.dhissantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu chabbaggiye bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, kupitaa anattamanaa bhikkhuu sa"nghikaa vihaaraa nikka.d.dhathaa''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, kupitaa anattamanaa bhikkhuu sa"nghikaa vihaaraa nikka.d.dhissatha? neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhu.m kupito anattamano sa"nghikaa vihaaraa nikka.d.dheyya vaa nikka.d.dhaapeyya vaa, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 126^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^bhikkhu^eb^nti ^a^P4.0045^ea^ ^a^V0.0066^ea^ a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m.
[03]^b^kupito^eb^ ^a^M0.0065^ea^^b^ anattamano^eb^ti anabhiraddho aahatacitto khilajaato.
[03]^b^sa"nghiko^eb^ naama vihaaro sa"nghassa dinno hoti pariccatto.

[03]^b^nikka.d.dheyyaa^eb^ti gabbhe gahetvaa pamukha.m nikka.d.dhati, aapatti paacittiyassa. pamukhe gahetvaa bahi nikka.d.dhati, aapatti paacittiyassa. ekena payogena bahukepi dvaare atikkaameti, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^nikka.d.dhaapeyyaa^eb^ti a~n~na.m aa.naapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa {dukka.tassa (katthaci)}. saki.m aa.natto bahukepi dvaare atikkaameti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ sa"nghike ^a^T2.0255^ea^ sa"nghikasa~n~nii kupito anattamano nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. sa"nghike vematiko kupito anattamano nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. sa"nghike puggalikasa~n~nii kupito anattamano nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]tassa parikkhaara.m nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa. vihaarassa upacaaraa vaa upa.t.thaanasaalaaya vaa ma.n.dapaa vaa rukkhamuulaa vaa ajjhokaasaa vaa nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa. tassa parikkhaara.m nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampanna.m vihaaraa vaa vihaarassa upacaaraa vaa upa.t.thaanasaalaaya vaa ma.n.dapaa vaa rukkhamuulaa vaa ajjhokaasaa vaa nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa. tassa parikkhaara.m nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa.
[03]puggalike sa"nghikasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. puggalike vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. puggalike puggalikasa~n~nii a~n~nassa puggalike aapatti dukka.tassa. attano puggalike anaapatti.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ anaapatti alajji.m nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, tassa parikkhaara.m nikka.d.dhati ^a^V0.0067^ea^ vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, ummattaka.m nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, tassa parikkhaara.m nikka.d.dhati vaa ^a^T2.0256^ea^ nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, bha.n.danakaaraka.m kalahakaaraka.m vivaadakaaraka.m bhassakaaraka.m sa"nghe adhikara.nakaaraka.m nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti ^a^M0.0066^ea^ vaa, tassa parikkhaara.m nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, antevaasika.m vaa saddhivihaarika.m vaa na sammaa vattanta.m nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, tassa parikkhaara.m nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] nikka.d.dhanasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0257^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena ^a^P4.0046^ea^ dve bhikkhuu sa"nghike vihaare uparivehaasaku.tiyaa viharanti?. eko he.t.thaa viharati {viharanti, eko he.t.thaa (?)}, eko upari. uparimo bhikkhu aahaccapaadaka.m ma~nca.m sahasaa abhinisiidi. ma~ncapaado nippatitvaa {patitvaa (syaa0)} he.t.thimassa bhikkhuno matthake avatthaasi. so bhikkhu vissaramakaasi. bhikkhuu upadhaavitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``kissa tva.m, aavuso, vissaramakaasii''ti? atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu sa"nghike vihaare uparivehaasaku.tiyaa aahaccapaadaka.m ma~nca.m sahasaa abhinisiidissatii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu ta.m bhikkhu.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, sa"nghike vihaare uparivehaasaku.tiyaa aahaccapaadaka.m ma~nca.m sahasaa abhinisiidasii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, sa"nghike vihaare uparivehaasaku.tiyaa aahaccapaadaka.m ma~nca.m sahasaa abhinisiidissasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu sa"nghike vihaare uparivehaasaku.tiyaa aahaccapaadaka.m ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m^eb^ ^a^T2.0258^ea^ ^b^vaa abhinisiideyya vaa abhinipajjeyya vaa, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^M0.0067^ea^ ^a^V0.0068^ea^^b^ panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^sa"nghiko^eb^ naama vihaaro sa"nghassa dinno hoti pariccatto.

[03]^b^aahaccapaadako^eb^ naama ^b^ma~nco^eb^ a"nge vijjhitvaa .thito hoti. ^b^aahaccapaadaka.m^eb^ naama ^b^pii.tha.m^eb^ a"nge vijjhitvaa .thita.m hoti.
[03]^b^abhinisiideyyaa^eb^ti tasmi.m abhinisiidati, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]puggalike sa"nghikasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. puggalike vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. puggalike puggalikasa~n~nii a~n~nassa puggalike, aapatti dukka.tassa. attano puggalike, anaapatti.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ anaapatti -- avehaasaku.tiyaa siisagha.t.taaya he.t.thaa aparibhoga.m ^a^T2.0259^ea^ hoti, padarasa~ncita.m hoti, pa.taa.ni dinnaa hoti, tasmi.m .thito ga.nhati vaa laggeti vaa, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] vehaasaku.tisikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0260^ea^ ^a^P4.0047^ea^ ^a^V0.0069^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmato channassa upa.t.thaako mahaamatto aayasmato channassa vihaara.m kaaraapeti. atha kho aayasmaa channo katapariyosita.m vihaara.m punappuna.m chaadaapeti, punappuna.m ^a^M0.0068^ea^ lepaapeti. atibhaarito vihaaro paripati. atha kho aayasmaa channo ti.na~nca ka.t.tha~nca sa.mka.d.dhanto a~n~natarassa braahma.nassa yavakhetta.m duusesi. atha kho so braahma.no ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa amhaaka.m yavakhetta.m duusessantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tassa braahma.nassa ujjhaayantassa khiyyantassa vipaacentassa. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa channo katapariyosita.m vihaara.m punappuna.m chaadaapessati, punappuna.m lepaapessati, atibhaarito vihaaro paripatii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m channa.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, channa, katapariyosita.m vihaara.m punappuna.m chaadaapesi, punappuna.m lepaapesi, atibhaarito vihaaro paripatii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, katapariyosita.m vihaara.m punappuna.m chaadaapessasi, punappuna.m lepaapessasi ^a^T2.0261^ea^, atibhaarito vihaaro paripati! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ^b^``mahallaka.m pana bhikkhunaa vihaara.m kaarayamaanena yaavadvaarakosaa agga.la.t.thapanaaya aalokasandhiparikammaaya dvatticchadanassa pariyaaya appaharite .thitena adhi.t.thaatabba.m. tato ce uttari.m appaharitepi .thito adhi.t.thaheyya paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahallako^eb^ naama vihaaro sassaamiko vuccati.
[03]^b^vihaaro^eb^ naama ullitto vaa hoti avalitto vaa ullittaavalitto vaa.
[03]^b^kaarayamaanenaa^eb^ti karonto vaa kaaraapento vaa.
[03]^b^yaava dvaarakosaa^eb^ti pi.t.thasa"nghaa.tassa {pii.thasa.mghaa.tassa (itipi), pi.t.thisa"nghaa.tassa (syaa0)} samantaa hatthapaasaa.
[03]^b^agga.la.t.thapanaayaa^eb^ti ^a^V0.0070^ea^ dvaara.t.thapanaaya.
[03]^b^aalokasandhiparikammaayaa^eb^ti vaatapaanaparikammaaya setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika.m.

[03]^b^dvatticchadanassa^eb^ ^a^P4.0048^ea^ ^a^M0.0069^ea^^b^ pariyaaya.m appaharite .thitena adhi.t.thaatabba^eb^nti -- harita.m naama pubba.n.na.m apara.n.na.m. sace harite .thito adhi.t.thaati, aapatti dukka.tassa. maggena chaadentassa dve magge adhi.t.thahitvaa tatiya.m magga.m aa.naapetvaa pakkamitabba.m. pariyaayena chaadentassa dve pariyaaye adhi.t.thahitvaa tatiya.m pariyaaya.m aa.naapetvaa pakkamitabba.m.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ^b^tato ce uttari appaharitepi .thito adhi.t.thaheyyaa^eb^ti i.t.thakaaya ^a^T2.0262^ea^ chaadentassa i.t.thaki.t.thakaaya aapatti paacittiyassa. silaaya chaadentassa silaaya silaaya aapatti paacittiyassa. sudhaaya chaadentassa pi.n.de pi.n.de aapatti paacittiyassa. ti.nena chaadentassa kara.le kara.le aapatti paacittiyassa. pa.n.nena chaadentassa pa.n.ne pa.n.ne aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]atirekadvattipariyaaye atirekasa~n~nii adhi.t.thaati, aapatti paacittiyassa. atirekadvattipariyaaye vematiko adhi.t.thaati, aapatti paacittiyassa. atirekadvattipariyaaye uunakasa~n~nii adhi.t.thaati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]uunakadvattipariyaaye atirekasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. uunakadvattipariyaaye vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. uunakadvattipariyaaye uunakasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ anaapatti dvattipariyaaye, uunakadvattipariyaaye, le.ne, guhaaya, ti.naku.tikaaya, a~n~nassatthaaya, attano dhanena, vaasaagaara.m .thapetvaa sabbattha anaapatti, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] mahallakavihaarasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu jaana.m sappaa.naka.m udaka.m ti.na.m vaa mattika.m vaa si~nceyya vaa si~ncaapeyya vaa, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^jaanaati^eb^ naama {jaana.m naama (syaa0)} saama.m vaa jaanaati a~n~ne vaa tassa aarocenti.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0265^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena theraa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo ovadantaa laabhino honti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. atha kho chabbaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``etarahi kho, aavuso, theraa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo ovadantaa laabhino honti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. handaavuso, mayampi bhikkhuniyo ovadaamaa''ti. atha kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``amhepi, ^a^P4.0050^ea^ bhaginiyo, upasa"nkamatha; mayampi ovadissaamaa''ti.

[03]atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo yena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa chabbaggiye bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. atha kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniina.m ^a^V0.0073^ea^ paritta~n~neva dhammi.m katha.m katvaa divasa.m tiracchaanakathaaya viitinaametvaa uyyojesu.m -- ``gacchatha, bhaginiyo''ti. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kacci, bhikkhuniyo, ovaado iddho ahosii''ti? ``kuto, bhante, ovaado iddho bhavissati! ayyaa chabbaggiyaa paritta~n~neva dhammi.m katha.m katvaa divasa.m tiracchaanakathaaya viitinaametvaa uyyojesu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa taa bhikkhuniyo dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi ^a^T2.0266^ea^. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa chabbaggiye bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniina.m ^a^M0.0072^ea^ paritta~n~neva dhammi.m katha.m katvaa divasa.m tiracchaanakathaaya viitinaametvaa uyyojethaa''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, bhikkhuniina.m paritta~n~neva dhammi.m katha.m katvaa divasa.m tiracchaanakathaaya viitinaametvaa uyyojessatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhunovaadaka.m sammannitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo. yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03] 145^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhunovaadaka.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhunovaadaka.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunovaadakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m ^a^T2.0267^ea^ bhikkhunovaadaka.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunovaadakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato ^a^V0.0074^ea^ sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.
[03]atha kho bhagavaa chabbaggiye bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa ^a^P4.0051^ea^ dubbharataaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 146^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu asammato bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya paacittiya''^eb^nti.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0270^ea^ ^a^V0.0076^ea^ sammatena bhikkhunaa parive.na.m sammajjitvaa paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetvaa dutiya.m gahetvaa nisiiditabba.m. bhikkhuniihi tattha gantvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiiditabba.m. tena bhikkhunaa pucchitabbaa -- ``samaggaattha, bhaginiyo''ti? sace ``samaggaamhaayyaa''ti bha.nanti, ``vattanti, bhaginiyo, a.t.tha garudhammaa''ti? sace ``vattantaayyaa''ti bha.nanti, ``eso, bhaginiyo, ovaado''ti niyyaadetabbo {niyyaatetabbo (itipi)}. sace ``na vattantaayyaa''ti bha.nanti, osaaretabbaa. ``vassasatuupasampannaaya bhikkhuniyaa tadahupasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivaadana.m paccu.t.thaana.m a~njalikamma.m saamiicikamma.m kaatabba.m; ayampi dhammo sakkatvaa garukatvaa maanetvaa puujetvaa ^a^M0.0075^ea^ yaavajiiva.m anatikkamaniiyo. na bhikkhuniyaa abhikkhuke aavaase vassa.m vasitabba.m; ayampi dhammo sakkatvaa garukatvaa maanetvaa puujetvaa yaavajiiva.m anatikkamaniiyo. anvaddhamaasa.m bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhusa"nghato dve dhammaa paccaasiisitabbaa {paccaasi.msitabbaa (itipi)} uposathapucchaka~nca ovaadupasa"nkamana~nca, ayampi dhammo...pe0... vassa.m vu.t.thaaya bhikkhuniyaa ubhatosa"nghe tiihi .thaanehi pavaaretabba.m di.t.thena vaa sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa; ayampi dhammo...pe0... garudhamma.m ajjhaapannaaya bhikkhuniyaa ubhatosa"nghe pakkhamaanatta.m caritabba.m; ayampi ^a^T2.0271^ea^ dhammo...pe0... dve vassaani chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaaya sikkhamaanaaya ubhatosa"nghe upasampadaa pariyesitabbaa; ayampi dhammo...pe0... na bhikkhuniyaa kena ci pariyaayena bhikkhu akkositabbo paribhaasitabbo; ayampi dhammo...pe0... ajjatagge ova.to bhikkhuniina.m bhikkhuusu vacanapatho, anova.to bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniisu vacanapatho; ayampi dhammo sakkatvaa garukatvaa maanetvaa puujetvaa yaavajiiva.m anatikkamaniiyo''ti.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0274^ea^ ^a^P4.0054^ea^ ^a^M0.0077^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena theraa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo ovadanti pariyaayena. tena kho pana samayena aayasmato cuu.lapanthakassa pariyaayo hoti bhikkhuniyo ovaditu.m. bhikkhuniyo evamaaha.msu -- ``na daani ajja ovaado iddho bhavissati, ta~n~neva daani udaana.m ayyo cuu.lapanthako punappuna.m bha.nissatii''ti. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo yenaayasmaa cuu.lapanthako tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m cuu.lapanthaka.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho taa bhikkhuniyo aayasmaa cuu.lapanthako etadavoca -- ``samaggaattha, bhaginiyo''ti? ``samaggaamhaayyaa''ti. ``vattanti, bhaginiyo, a.t.tha garudhammaa''ti? ``vattantaayyaa''ti. ``eso, bhaginiyo, ovaado''ti niyyaadetvaa ima.m udaana.m punappuna.m abhaasi --
[21] {udaa0 37} ``adhicetaso ^a^V0.0079^ea^ appamajjato, munino monapathesu sikkhato.
[22] sokaa na bhavanti taadino, upasantassa sadaa satiimato''ti..

[03]bhikkhuniyo evamaaha.msu -- ``nanu avocumhaa -- na daani ajja ovaado iddho bhavissati, ta~n~neva daani udaana.m ayyo cuu.lapanthako punappuna.m ^a^T2.0275^ea^ bha.nissatii''ti! assosi kho aayasmaa cuu.lapanthako taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m ima.m kathaasallaapa.m. atha kho aayasmaa cuu.lapanthako vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa aakaase antalikkhe ca"nkamatipi ti.t.thatipi nisiidatipi seyyampi kappeti dhuumaayatipi pajjalatipi antaradhaayatipi, ta~nceva {ta~n~neva (itipi)} udaana.m bha.nati a~n~na~nca bahu.m buddhavacana.m. bhikkhuniyo evamaaha.msu -- ``acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho, na vata no ito pubbe ovaado eva.m iddho bhuutapubbo yathaa ayyassa cuu.lapanthakassaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa cuu.lapanthako taa bhikkhuniyo yaava samandhakaaraa ovaditvaa uyyojesi -- gacchatha bhaginiyoti.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0078^ea^ kho taa bhikkhuniyo nagaradvaare thakite bahinagare vasitvaa kaalasseva nagara.m pavisanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``abrahmacaariniyo imaa bhikkhuniyo; aaraame bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m vasitvaa idaani nagara.m pavisantii''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ^a^P4.0055^ea^ ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa cuu.lapanthako attha"ngate suuriye bhikkhuniyo ovadissatii''ti...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, cuu.lapanthaka, attha"ngate suuriye bhikkhuniyo ovadasii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, cuu.lapanthaka, attha"ngate suuriye bhikkhuniyo ovadissasi! neta.m, cuu.lapanthaka, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ anaapatti uddesa.m dento, paripuccha.m dento, ``osaarehi ayyaa''ti vuccamaano, osaareti, pa~nha.m pucchati, pa~nha.m pu.t.tho katheti, a~n~nassatthaaya bha.nanta.m bhikkhuniyo su.nanti, sikkhamaanaaya saama.neriyaa, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] attha"ngatasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0277^ea^ ^a^M0.0079^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo ovadanti. bhikkhuniyo chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo etadavocu.m -- ``ethaayye, ovaada.m ^a^P4.0056^ea^ gamissaamaa''ti. ``yampi {ya.m hi (ka0)} maya.m, ayye, gaccheyyaama ovaadassa kaara.naa, ayyaa chabbaggiyaa idheva aagantvaa amhe ovadantii''ti. bhikkhuniyo ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniyo ovadissantii''ti {chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo ovaada.m na gacchissantiiti (sii0)}! atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniyo ovadissantii''ti...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave ^a^V0.0081^ea^, bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniyo ovadathaa''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniyo ovadissatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m ^a^T2.0278^ea^ bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena mahaapajaapati gotamii gilaanaa hoti. theraa bhikkhuu yena mahaapajaapati gotamii tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa mahaapajaapati.m gotami.m etadavocu.m -- ``kacci te, gotami, khamaniiya.m kacci yaapaniiya''nti? ``na me, ayyaa, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m''. ``i"nghayyaa, dhamma.m desethaa''ti. ``na, bhagini, kappati bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniyo dhamma.m desetu''nti kukkuccaayantaa na desesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena mahaapajaapati gotamii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa mahaapajaapati.m gotami.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, gotami, khamaniiya.m kacci yaapaniiya''nti ^a^M0.0080^ea^? ``pubbe me, bhante, theraa bhikkhuu aagantvaa dhamma.m desenti. tena me phaasu hoti. idaani pana -- ``bhagavataa pa.tikkhitta''nti, kukkuccaayantaa na desenti. tena me na phaasu hotii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa mahaapajaapati.m gotami.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa gilaana.m bhikkhuni.m ovaditu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo^eb^ ^a^P4.0057^ea^^b^ pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m ^a^T2.0279^ea^. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanaa hoti bhikkhunii -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.

[03]^b^bhikkhunupassayo^eb^ ^a^V0.0082^ea^ naama yattha bhikkhuniyo ekarattampi vasanti.
[03]^b^upasa"nkamitvaa^eb^ti tattha gantvaa.

[03]^b^ovadeyyaa^eb^ti a.t.thahi garudhammehi ovadati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^a~n~natra samayaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa samaya.m.
[03]^b^gilaanaa^eb^ naama bhikkhunii na sakkoti ovaadaaya vaa sa.mvaasaaya vaa gantu.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ upasampannaaya upasampannasa~n~nii bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa a~n~natra samayaa ovadati, aapatti paacittiyassa. upasampannaaya vematiko bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa a~n~natra samayaa ovadati, aapatti paacittiyassa. upasampannaaya anupasampannasa~n~nii bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa a~n~natra samayaa ovadati, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]a~n~nena dhammena ovadati, aapatti dukka.tassa. ekatoupasampannaaya ovadati, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampannaaya upasampannasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa ^a^M0.0081^ea^. anupasampannaaya vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampannaaya anupasampannasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `aamisahetu theraa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo ovandatii'ti, paacittiya''^eb^nti.

[03]^b^aamisahetuu^eb^ti ciivarahetu pi.n.dapaatahetu senaasanahetu gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarahetu sakkaarahetu garukaarahetu maananahetu vandanahetu puujanahetu.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0284^ea^ ^a^P4.0059^ea^ ^a^M0.0083^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu saavatthiya.m a~n~natarissaa visikhaaya pi.n.daaya carati. a~n~nataraapi bhikkhunii tassaa visikhaaya pi.n.daaya carati. atha kho so bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca -- ``gaccha, bhagini, amukasmi.m okaase bhikkhaa diyyatii''ti. saapi kho evamaaha -- ``gacchaayya, amukasmi.m okaase bhikkhaa diyyatii''ti. te abhi.nhadassanena sandi.t.thaa ahesu.m. tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa ciivara.m bhaajiiyati. atha kho saa bhikkhunii ovaada.m gantvaa yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho ta.m bhikkhuni.m so bhikkhu etadavoca -- ``aya.m me, bhagini, ciivarapa.tiviiso {pa.tivi.mso (sii0), pa.tiviso (itipi)}; saadiyissasii''ti? ``aamaayya, dubbalaciivaraamhii''ti.

[03]atha kho so bhikkhu tassaa bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m adaasi. sopi kho bhikkhu dubbalaciivaro hoti. bhikkhuu ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``karohi daani te, aavuso, ciivara''nti ^a^V0.0085^ea^. atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m dassatii''ti...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m adaasii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``~naatikaa te ^a^T2.0285^ea^, bhikkhu, a~n~naatikaa''ti? ``a~n~naatikaa, bhagavaa''ti. ``a~n~naatako, moghapurisa, a~n~naatikaaya na jaanaati patiruupa.m vaa appatiruupa.m vaa santa.m vaa asanta.m vaa. katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m dassasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m dadeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa bhikkhuniina.m paarivattaka.m {paariva.t.taka.m (itipi)} ciivara.m na denti. bhikkhuniyo ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyaa amhaaka.m paarivattaka.m ciivara.m ^a^P4.0060^ea^ na dassantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu ^a^M0.0084^ea^ taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m ujjhaayantiina.m khiyyantiina.m vipaacentiina.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m paarivattaka.m daatu.m. bhikkhussa, bhikkhuniyaa, sikkhamaanaaya, saama.nerassa, saama.neriyaa -- anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m paarivattaka.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] {paaci0 286, 291; paaraa0 445,454} ^b^raho^eb^ ^a^P4.0069^ea^ naama cakkhussa raho sotassa raho. cakkhussa raho naama na sakkaa hoti akkhi.m vaa nikha.niiyamaane bhamuka.m vaa ukkhipiiyamaane siisa.m vaa ukkhipiiyamaane passitu.m. sotassa raho naama na sakkaa hoti pakatikathaa sotu.m.
[03]^b^nisajja.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0097^ea^ ^b^kappeyyaa^eb^ti bhikkhuniyaa nisinnaaya bhikkhu upanisinno vaa hoti upanipanno vaa, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]bhikkhu nisinne bhikkhunii upanisinnaa vaa hoti upanipannaa vaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. ubho vaa nisinnaa honti ubho vaa nipannaa, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ raho ^a^M0.0095^ea^ rahosa~n~nii eko ekaaya nisajja.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. raho vematiko eko ekaaya nisajja.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. raho arahosa~n~nii eko ekaaya nisajja.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]araho rahosa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. araho vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. araho arahosa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 202^b^.^eb^ anaapatti yo koci vi~n~nuu dutiyo hoti, ti.t.thati na nisiidati, arahopekkho, a~n~navihito nisiidati, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] rahonisajjasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.
[06] ovaadavaggo tatiyo.

[21] asammataattha"ngatuu ^a^T2.0304^ea^, passayaamisadaanena.
