[03] 203^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0305^ea^ ^a^V0.0098^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena saavatthiyaa aviduure a~n~natarassa puugassa aavasathapi.n.do pa~n~natto hoti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa pi.n.da.m alabhamaanaa aavasatha.m agama.msu. manussaa -- ``cirassampi bhadantaa aagataa''ti te sakkacca.m parivisi.msu. atha kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu dutiyampi divasa.m...pe0... tatiyampi divasa.m pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa pi.n.da.m alabhamaanaa aavasatha.m gantvaa bhu~nji.msu. atha kho chabbaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m maya.m karissaama aaraama.m gantvaa! hiyyopi idheva aagantabba.m bhavissatii''ti, tattheva anuvasitvaa anuvasitvaa ^a^P4.0070^ea^ aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njanti. titthiyaa apasakkanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ^a^M0.0096^ea^ sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa anuvasitvaa anuvasitvaa aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njissanti! nayimesa~n~neva aavasathapi.n.do pa~n~natto; sabbesa~n~neva aavasathapi.n.do pa~n~natto''ti.

[03]assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu anuvasitvaa anuvasitvaa aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njissantiiti...pe0... ^a^T2.0306^ea^ sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, anuvasitvaa anuvasitvaa aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njathaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, anuvasitvaa anuvasitvaa aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njissatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``eko aavasathapi.n.do bhu~njitabbo. tato ce uttari.m bhu~njeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0099^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto kosalesu janapade saavatthi.m gacchanto yena a~n~nataro aavasatho tenupasa"nkami. manussaa -- ``cirassampi thero aagato''ti sakkacca.m parivisi.msu. atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa bhuttaavissa kharo aabaadho uppajji, naasakkhi tamhaa aavasathaa pakkamitu.m. atha kho te manussaa dutiyampi divasa.m aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``bhu~njatha, bhante''ti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto -- ``bhagavataa pa.tikkhitta.m anuvasitvaa anuvasitvaa aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njitu''nti kukkuccaayanto na pa.tiggahesi; chinnabhatto ahosi. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi ^a^T2.0307^ea^ -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanena bhikkhunaa anuvasitvaa anuvasitvaa aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 205^b^.^eb^ ^b^``agilaanena bhikkhunaa eko aavasathapi.n.do bhu~njitabbo. tato ce uttari bhu~njeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ^b^agilaano^eb^ ^a^M0.0097^ea^ naama sakkoti tamhaa aavasathaa pakkamitu.m.
[03]^b^gilaano^eb^ naama na sakkoti tamhaa aavasathaa pakkamitu.m.

[03]^b^aavasathapi.n.do^eb^ ^a^P4.0071^ea^ naama pa~ncanna.m bhojanaana.m a~n~natara.m bhojana.m -- saalaaya vaa ma.n.dape vaa rukkhamuule vaa ajjhokaase vaa anodissa yaavadattho pa~n~natto hoti. agilaanena bhikkhunaa saki.m bhu~njitabbo. tato ce uttari `bhu~njissaamii'ti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa. ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ agilaano agilaanasa~n~nii tatuttari aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. agilaano vematiko tatuttari aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. agilaano gilaanasa~n~nii tatuttari.m aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]gilaano ^a^V0.0100^ea^ agilaanasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. gilaano vematiko aapatti dukka.tassa. gilaano gilaanasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ anaapatti gilaanassa, agilaano saki.m bhu~njati, gacchanto, vaa aagacchanto vaa bhu~njati, saamikaa nimantetvaa bhojenti, odissa ^a^T2.0308^ea^ pa~n~natto hoti, na yaavadattho pa~n~natto hoti, pa~nca bhojanaani .thapetvaa sabbattha anaapatti, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] aavasathapi.n.dasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0309^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena devadatto parihiinalaabhasakkaaro sapariso kulesu vi~n~naapetvaa vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njati. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa kulesu vi~n~naapetvaa vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njissanti! kassa sampanna.m na manaapa.m, kassa saadu.m na ruccatii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti ^a^M0.0098^ea^ khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama devadatto sapariso kulesu vi~n~naapetvaa vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njissatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tva.m, devadatta, sapariso kulesu vi~n~naapetvaa vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njasiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, sapariso kulesu vi~n~naapetvaa vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njissasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``ga.nabhojane paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0310^ea^ ^a^P4.0072^ea^ kho pana samayena manussaa gilaane bhikkhuu bhattena nimantenti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti -- ``pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa ga.nabhojana''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi ^a^V0.0101^ea^ -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanena bhikkhunaa ga.nabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``ga.nabhojane, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena manussaa ciivaradaanasamaye saciivarabhatta.m pa.tiyaadetvaa bhikkhuu nimantenti -- ``bhojetvaa ciivarena acchaadessaamaa''ti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti -- ``pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa ga.nabhojana''nti. ciivara.m paritta.m uppajjati. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ciivaradaanasamaye ga.nabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``ga.nabhojane, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanasamayo, ciivaradaanasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena manussaa ciivarakaarake bhikkhuu bhattena nimantenti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti -- ``pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa ^a^T2.0311^ea^ ga.nabhojana''nti ^a^M0.0099^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ciivarakaarasamaye ga.nabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``ga.nabhojane, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanasamayo, ciivaradaanasamayo, ciivarakaarasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu manussehi saddhi.m addhaana.m ^a^P4.0073^ea^ gacchanti. atha kho ^a^V0.0102^ea^ te bhikkhuu te manusse etadavocu.m -- ``muhutta.m, aavuso, aagametha; pi.n.daaya carissaamaa''ti. te evamaaha.msu -- ``idheva, bhante, bhu~njathaa''ti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na pa.tigga.nhanti -- ``pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa ga.nabhojana''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, addhaanagamanasamaye ga.nabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``ga.nabhojane, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanasamayo, ciivaradaanasamayo, ciivarakaarasamayo, addhaanagamanasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu manussehi saddhi.m naavaaya gacchanti. atha kho te bhikkhuu te manusse etadavocu.m -- ``muhutta.m, aavuso, tiira.m upanetha; pi.n.daaya carissaamaa''ti. te evamaaha.msu ^a^T2.0312^ea^ -- ``idheva, bhante, bhu~njathaa''ti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na pa.tigga.nhanti -- ``pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa ga.nabhojana''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, naavaabhiruhanasamaye ga.nabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]^b^``ga.nabhojane, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanasamayo, ciivaradaanasamayo, ciivarakaarasamayo, addhaanagamanasamayo, naavaabhiruhanasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0010^ea^0 kho pana samayena disaasu vassa.mvu.t.thaa bhikkhuu raajagaha.m aagacchanti bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. manussaa naanaaverajjake bhikkhuu passitvaa bhattena nimantenti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti -- ``pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa ga.nabhojana''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, mahaasamaye ga.nabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]^b^``ga.nabhojane ^a^V0.0103^ea^, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanasamayo, ciivaradaanasamayo, ciivarakaarasamayo, addhaanagamanasamayo, naavaabhiruhanasamayo, mahaasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0074^ea^ kho pana samayena ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa ~naatisaalohito aajiivakesu pabbajito hoti. atha kho so ^a^T2.0313^ea^ aajiivako yena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, mahaaraaja, sabbapaasa.n.dikabhatta.m kaatu''nti. ``sace tva.m, bhante, buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.thama.m bhojeyyaasi''. ``eva.m kareyyaamii''ti. atha kho so aajiivako bhikkhuuna.m santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``adhivaasentu me bhikkhuu svaatanaaya bhatta''nti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti -- ``pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa ga.nabhojana''nti. atha kho so aajiivako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho so aajiivako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhavampi gotamo pabbajito, ahampi pabbajito; arahati pabbajito pabbajitassa pi.n.da.m pa.tiggahetu.m. adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho so aajiivako bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sama.nabhattasamaye ga.nabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ^b^ga.nabhojane^eb^ ^a^M0.0101^ea^^b^, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanasamayo, ciivaradaanasamayo, ciivarakaarasamayo, addhaanagamanasamayo, naavaabhiruhanasamayo, mahaasamayo, sama.nabhattasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ^b^ga.nabhojana.m^eb^ ^a^T2.0314^ea^ naama yattha cattaaro bhikkhuu pa~ncanna.m bhojanaana.m a~n~natarena bhojanena nimantitaa bhu~njanti. eta.m ga.nabhojana.m naama.
[03]^b^a~n~natra samayaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa samaya.m.
[03]^b^gilaanasamayo^eb^ ^a^V0.0104^ea^ naama antamaso paadaapi phalitaa {phaalitaa (syaa0 ka0)} honti. ``gilaanasamayo''ti bhu~njitabba.m.
[03]^b^ciivaradaanasamayo^eb^ naama anatthate kathine vassaanassa pacchimo maaso, atthate kathine pa~ncamaasaa. ``ciivaradaanasamayo''ti bhu~njitabba.m.
[03]^b^ciivarakaarasamayo^eb^ naama ciivare kayiramaane. ``ciivarakaarasamayo''ti bhu~njitabba.m.
[03]^b^addhaanagamanasamayo^eb^ ^a^P4.0075^ea^ naama ``addhayojana.m gacchissaamii''ti bhu~njitabba.m, gacchantena bhu~njitabba.m, gatena bhu~njitabba.m.
[03]^b^naavaabhiruhanasamayo^eb^ naama ``naava.m abhiruhissaamii''ti bhu~njitabba.m, aaru.lhena bhu~njitabba.m, oru.lhena bhu~njitabba.m.
[03]^b^mahaasamayo^eb^ naama yattha dve tayo bhikkhuu pi.n.daaya caritvaa yaapenti, catutthe aagate na yaapenti. ``mahaasamayo''ti bhu~njitabba.m.
[03]^b^sama.nabhattasamayo^eb^ naama yo koci paribbaajakasamaapanno bhatta.m karoti. ``sama.nabhattasamayo''ti bhu~njitabba.m.
[03]``a~n~natra samayaa bhu~njissaamii''ti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa. ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ga.nabhojane ga.nabhojanasa~n~nii, a~n~natra samayaa, bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. ga.nabhojane vematiko, a~n~natra samayaa, bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. ga.nabhojane naga.nabhojanasa~n~nii, a~n~natra samayaa, bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]naga.nabhojane ^a^M0.0102^ea^ ga.nabhojanasa~n~nii ^a^T2.0315^ea^, aapatti dukka.tassa. naga.nabhojane vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. naga.nabhojane naga.nabhojanasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ anaapatti ^a^V0.0105^ea^ samaye, dve tayo ekato bhu~njanti, pi.n.daaya caritvaa ekato sannipatitvaa bhu~njanti, niccabhatta.m, salaakabhatta.m, pakkhika.m, uposathika.m, paa.tipadika.m, pa~nca bhojanaani .thapetvaa sabbattha anaapatti, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] ga.nabhojanasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0316^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena vesaaliya.m pa.niitaana.m bhattaana.m bhattapa.tipaa.ti adhi.t.thitaa hoti. atha kho a~n~natarassa daliddassa kammakaarassa {kammakarassa (sii0)} etadahosi -- ``na kho ida.m oraka.m bhavissati yathayime manussaa sakkacca.m bhatta.m karonti; ya.mnuunaahampi bhatta.m kareyya''nti. atha kho so daliddo kammakaaro yena kirapatiko tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m kirapatika.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, ayyaputta, buddhappamukhassa ^a^P4.0076^ea^ bhikkhusa"nghassa bhatta.m kaatu.m. dehi me vetana''nti. sopi kho kirapatiko saddho hoti pasanno. atha kho so kirapatiko tassa daliddassa kammakaarassa abbhaatireka.m {atireka.m (syaa0)} vetana.m adaasi. atha kho so daliddo kammakaaro yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so daliddo kammakaaro bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. ``mahaa kho, aavuso, bhikkhusa"ngho. jaanaahii''ti. ``hotu {hotu me (ka0)} bhante, mahaa bhikkhusa"ngho. bahuu me badaraa pa.tiyattaa badaramissena peyyaa paripuurissantii''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0103^ea^ kho so daliddo kammakaaro bhagavato ^a^T2.0317^ea^ adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu -- ``daliddena kira kammakaarena svaatanaaya buddhappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho nimantito, badaramissena peyyaa paripuurissantii''ti. te kaalasseva pi.n.daaya caritvaa bhu~nji.msu. assosu.m kho manussaa -- ``daliddena kira kammakaarena buddhappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho nimantito''ti. te daliddassa kammakaarassa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m abhihari.msu. atha kho so daliddo kammakaaro tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.

[03]atha ^a^V0.0106^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena tassa daliddassa kammakaarassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho so daliddo kammakaaro bhattagge bhikkhuu parivisati. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``thoka.m, aavuso, dehi. thoka.m, aavuso, dehii''ti. ``maa kho tumhe, bhante, `aya.m daliddo kammakaaro'ti thoka.m thoka.m pa.tigga.nhittha. pahuuta.m me khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyatta.m.

[03]pa.tigga.nhatha, bhante, yaavadattha''nti. ``na kho maya.m, aavuso, eta.mkaara.naa thoka.m thoka.m pa.tigga.nhaama. apica, maya.m kaalasseva pi.n.daaya caritvaa bhu~njimhaa; tena maya.m thoka.m thoka.m pa.tigga.nhaamaa''ti.

[03]atha kho so daliddo kammakaaro ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama ^a^T2.0318^ea^ bhadantaa mayaa nimantitaa a~n~natra bhu~njissanti! na caaha.m pa.tibalo yaavadattha.m daatu''nti? assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tassa daliddassa kammakaarassa ^a^P4.0077^ea^ ujjhaayantassa khiyyantassa vipaacentassa. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu a~n~natra nimantitaa a~n~natra bhu~njissantii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu a~n~natra nimantitaa a~n~natra bhu~njantiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa a~n~natra nimantitaa a~n~natra bhu~njissanti! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``paramparabhojane^eb^ ^a^M0.0104^ea^ ^b^paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. a~n~nataro bhikkhu pi.n.dapaata.m aadaaya yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``bhu~njaahi, aavuso''ti. ``ala.m, aavuso, atthi me bhattapaccaasaa''ti. tassa bhikkhuno pi.n.dapaato ussuure {ussuurena (ka0)} aahariiyittha. so bhikkhu na cittaruupa.m bhu~nji. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanena bhikkhunaa paramparabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana ^a^T2.0319^ea^, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``paramparabhojane,^eb^ ^a^V0.0107^ea^ ^b^a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena manussaa ciivaradaanasamaye saciivarabhatta.m pa.tiyaadetvaa {pa.tiyaadaapetvaa (itipi)} bhikkhuu nimantenti -- ``bhojetvaa ciivarena acchaadessaamaa''ti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti -- ``pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa paramparabhojana''nti. ciivara.m paritta.m uppajjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ciivaradaanasamaye paramparabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``paramparabhojane, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanasamayo, ciivaradaanasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena manussaa ciivarakaarake bhikkhuu bhattena nimantenti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti -- ``pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa paramparabhojana''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ciivarakaarasamaye paramparabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ ^b^``paramparabhojane,^eb^ ^a^M0.0105^ea^^b^ a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. gilaanasamayo, ciivaradaanasamayo, ciivarakaarasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0320^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya ^a^P4.0078^ea^ aayasmataa aanandena pacchaasama.nena yena a~n~natara.m kula.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho te manussaa bhagavato ca aayasmato ca aanandassa bhojana.m ada.msu. aayasmaa aanando kukkuccaayanto na pa.tigga.nhaati. ``ga.nhaahi {patiga.nhaahi (sii0)}, aanandaa''ti. ``ala.m, bhagavaa ^a^V0.0108^ea^, atthi me bhattapaccaasaa''ti. ``tenahaananda, vikappetvaa ga.nhaahii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vikappetvaa {bhattapaccaasa.m vikappetvaa (syaa0)} paramparabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, vikappetabba.m -- `mayha.m bhattapaccaasa.m itthannaamassa dammii'''ti.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ ^b^paramparabhojana.m^eb^ naama pa~ncanna.m bhojanaana.m a~n~natarena bhojanena nimantito, ta.m .thapetvaa a~n~na.m pa~ncanna.m bhojanaana.m a~n~natara.m bhojana.m bhu~njati, eta.m paramparabhojana.m naama.
[03]^b^a~n~natra samayaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa samaya.m.
[03]^b^gilaanasamayo^eb^ naama na sakkoti ekaasane nisinno yaavadattha.m bhu~njitu.m. ``gilaanasamayo''ti bhu~njitabba.m.
[03]^b^ciivaradaanasamayo^eb^ naama anatthate kathine vassaanassa pacchimo maaso, atthate kathine pa~nca maasaa. ``ciivaradaanasamayo''ti bhu~njitabba.m.
[03]^b^ciivarakaarasamayo^eb^ naama ciivare kayiramaane. ``ciivarakaarasamayo''ti bhu~njitabba.m.
[03]``a~n~natra samayaa bhu~njissaamii''ti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa. ajjhohaare ^a^T2.0321^ea^ ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ paramparabhojane ^a^M0.0106^ea^ paramparabhojanasa~n~nii, a~n~natra samayaa, bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. paramparabhojane vematiko, a~n~natra samayaa, bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. paramparabhojane naparamparabhojanasa~n~nii, a~n~natra samayaa, bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]naparamparabhojane paramparabhojanasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. naparamparabhojane vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. naparamparabhojane naparamparabhojanasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ anaapatti samaye, vikappetvaa bhu~njati, dve tayo nimantane ekato bhu~njati, nimantanapa.tipaa.tiyaa bhu~njati, sakalena gaamena nimantito tasmi.m gaame yattha katthaci bhu~njati ^a^V0.0109^ea^, sakalena puugena nimantito tasmi.m puuge yattha katthaci bhu~njati, nimantiyamaano bhikkha.m gahessaamiiti bha.nati, niccabhatte, salaakabhatte, pakkhike, uposathike, paa.tipadike, pa~nca bhojanaani .thapetvaa sabbattha anaapatti, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] paramparabhojanasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0322^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena ^a^P4.0079^ea^ kaa.namaataa upaasikaa saddhaa hoti pasannaa. kaa.naa gaamake a~n~natarassa purisassa dinnaa hoti. atha kho kaa.naa maatughara.m agamaasi kenacideva kara.niiyena. atha kho kaa.naaya saamiko kaa.naaya santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``aagacchatu kaa.naa, icchaami kaa.naaya aagata''nti. atha kho kaa.namaataa upaasikaa ``kismi.m viya rittahattha.m gantu''nti puuva.m {puupa.m (.nvaadimoggallaane)} paci. pakke puuve a~n~nataro pi.n.dacaariko bhikkhu kaa.namaataaya upaasikaaya nivesana.m paavisi. atha kho kaa.namaataa upaasikaa tassa bhikkhuno puuva.m daapesi. so nikkhamitvaa a~n~nassa aacikkhi. tassapi puuva.m daapesi. sopi nikkhamitvaa a~n~nassa aacikkhi. tassapi puuva.m ^a^M0.0107^ea^ daapesi. yathaapa.tiyatta.m puuva.m parikkhaya.m agamaasi. dutiyampi kho kaa.naaya saamiko kaa.naaya santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``aagacchatu kaa.naa, icchaami kaa.naaya aagata''nti. dutiyampi kho kaa.namaataa upaasikaa ``kismi.m viya rittahatta.m gantu''nti puuva.m paci. pakke puuve a~n~nataro pi.n.dacaariko bhikkhu kaa.namaataaya upaasikaaya nivesana.m paavisi. atha kho kaa.namaataa upaasikaa tassa bhikkhuno puuva.m daapesi. so nikkhamitvaa a~n~nassa aacikkhi. tassapi puuva.m ^a^T2.0323^ea^ daapesi. sopi nikkhamitvaa a~n~nassa aacikkhi. tassapi puuva.m daapesi. yathaapa.tiyatta.m puuva.m parikkhaya.m agamaasi. tatiyampi kho kaa.naaya saamiko kaa.naaya santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``aagacchatu kaa.naa, icchaami kaa.naaya aagata.m. sace kaa.naa naagacchissati, aha.m a~n~na.m pajaapati.m aanessaamii''ti. tatiyampi kho kaa.namaataa upaasikaa kismi.m viya rittahattha.m gantunti puuva.m paci. pakke puuve a~n~nataro pi.n.dacaariko bhikkhu kaa.namaataaya upaasikaaya nivesana.m paavisi. atha kho kaa.namaataa upaasikaa tassa bhikkhuno puuva.m daapesi. so nikkhamitvaa a~n~nassa aacikkhi. tassapi puuva.m daapesi. sopi nikkhamitvaa a~n~nassa aacikkhi. tassapi ^a^V0.0110^ea^ puuva.m daapesi. yathaapa.tiyatta.m puuva.m parikkhaya.m agamaasi. atha kho kaa.naaya saamiko a~n~na.m pajaapati.m aanesi.

[03]assosi kho kaa.naa -- ``tena kira purisena a~n~naa pajaapati aaniitaa''ti. saa rodantii a.t.thaasi. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena kaa.namaataaya upaasikaaya nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho kaa.namaataa upaasikaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho kaa.namaatara.m upaasika.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kissaaya.m kaa.naa rodatii''ti? atha kho kaa.namaataa upaasikaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. atha kho bhagavaa kaa.namaatara.m upaasika.m dhammiyaa kathaaya ^a^T2.0324^ea^ sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro sattho raajagahaa pa.tiyaaloka.m gantukaamo hoti. a~n~nataro pi.n.dacaariko bhikkhu ta.m sattha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. a~n~nataro upaasako tassa bhikkhuno sattu.m ^a^M0.0108^ea^ daapesi. so nikkhamitvaa a~n~nassa aacikkhi. tassapi sattu.m daapesi. so nikkhamitvaa a~n~nassa aacikkhi. tassapi sattu.m daapesi. yathaapa.tiyatta.m paatheyya.m parikkhaya.m agamaasi ^a^P4.0080^ea^. atha kho so upaasako te manusse etadavoca -- ``ajja.nho, ayyaa, aagametha, yathaapa.tiyatta.m paatheyya.m ayyaana.m dinna.m. paatheyya.m pa.tiyaadessaamii''ti. ``naayyo {naayya (syaa0)} sakkaa aagametu.m, payaato sattho''ti agama.msu. atha kho tassa upaasakassa paatheyya.m pa.tiyaadetvaa pacchaa gacchantassa coraa acchindi.msu. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa na matta.m jaanitvaa pa.tiggahessanti! aya.m imesa.m datvaa pacchaa gacchanto corehi acchinno''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaami ^a^T2.0325^ea^ dasa atthavase pa.ticca -- sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya, sa"nghaphaasutaaya...pe0... vinayaanuggahaaya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ^b^``bhikkhu.m paneva kula.m upagata.m puuvehi vaa manthehi vaa abhiha.t.thu.m pavaareyya, aaka"nkhamaanena bhikkhunaa dvattipattapuuraa pa.tiggahetabbaa tato ce uttari pa.tigga.nheyya paacittiya.m. dvattipattapuure ^a^V0.0111^ea^ pa.tiggahetvaa tato niiharitvaa bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sa.mvibhajitabba.m. aya.m tattha saamiicii''^eb^ti.
[03] 233^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhikkhu.m paneva kula.m upagata^eb^nti kula.m naama cattaari kulaani -- khattiyakula.m, braahma.nakula.m, vessakula.m, suddakula.m.
[03]^b^upagata^eb^nti tattha gata.m.
[03]^b^puuva.m^eb^ naama ya.mki~nci pahe.nakatthaaya pa.tiyatta.m.
[03]^b^mantha.m^eb^ naama ya.mki~nci paatheyyatthaaya pa.tiyatta.m.
[03]^b^abhiha.t.thu.m pavaareyyaa^eb^ti yaavataka.m icchasi taavataka.m ga.nhaahiiti.
[03]^b^aaka"nkhamaanenaa^eb^ti icchamaanena.
[03]^b^dvattipattapuuraa pa.tiggahetabbaa^eb^ti dvetayo pattapuuraa pa.tiggahetabbaa.
[03]^b^tato^eb^ ^a^M0.0109^ea^ ^b^ce uttari pa.tiga.nheyyaa^eb^ti tatuttari pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^dvattipattapuure pa.tiggahetvaa^eb^ tato nikkhamantena bhikkhu.m passitvaa aacikkhitabba.m -- ``amutra mayaa dvattipattapuuraa pa.tiggahitaa, maa kho tattha pa.tigga.nhii''ti. sace passitvaa na aacikkhati, aapatti dukka.tassa. sace aacikkhite pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
[03]^b^tato^eb^ ^a^T2.0326^ea^ ^a^P4.0081^ea^ ^b^niiharitvaa bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sa.mvibhajitabba^eb^nti pa.tikkamana.m niiharitvaa sa.mvibhajitabba.m.
[03]^b^aya.m tattha saamiicii^eb^ti aya.m tattha anudhammataa.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ atirekadvattipattapuure atirekasa~n~nii pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti paacittiyassa. atirekadvattipattapuure ^a^V0.0112^ea^ vematiko pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti paacittiyassa. atirekadvattipattapuure uunakasa~n~nii pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]uunakadvattipattapuure atirekasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. uunakadvattipattapuure vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. uunakadvattipattapuure uunakasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ anaapatti dvattipattapuure pa.tigga.nhaati, uunakadvattipattapuure pa.tigga.nhaati, na pahe.nakatthaaya na paatheyyatthaaya pa.tiyatta.m denti, pahe.nakatthaaya vaa paatheyyatthaaya vaa pa.tiyattasesaka.m denti, gamane pa.tippassaddhe denti, ~naatakaana.m pavaaritaana.m, a~n~nassatthaaya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] kaa.namaatusikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0327^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro braahma.no bhikkhuu nimantetvaa bhojesi. bhikkhuu bhuttaavii pavaaritaa ~naatikulaani ^a^M0.0110^ea^ gantvaa ekacce bhu~nji.msu ekacce pi.n.dapaata.m aadaaya agama.msu. atha kho so braahma.no pa.tivissake {pa.tivisake (yojanaa)} etadavoca -- ``bhikkhuu mayaa ayyaa santappitaa. etha, tumhepi santappessaamii''ti. te evamaaha.msu -- ``ki.m tva.m, ayyo {ayya (syaa0)}, amhe santappessasi? yepi tayaa nimantitaa tepi amhaaka.m gharaani aagantvaa ekacce bhu~nji.msu ekacce pi.n.dapaata.m aadaaya agama.msuu''ti!

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0353^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto sahaayakassa ghara.m gantvaa tassa pajaapatiyaa saddhi.m sayanighare {sayaniighare (syaa0)} nisajja.m kappesi. atha kho so puriso yenaayasmaa upanando sakyaputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso pajaapati.m etadavoca -- ``dadehaayyassa bhikkha''nti. atha kho saa itthii aayasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa bhikkha.m adaasi. atha kho so puriso aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m etadavoca -- ``gacchatha, bhante, yato ayyassa bhikkhaa dinnaa''ti. atha kho saa itthii sallakkhetvaa -- ``pariyu.t.thito aya.m puriso''ti, aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m etadavoca ^a^M0.0127^ea^ -- ``nisiidatha, bhante, maa agamitthaa''ti. dutiyampi kho so puriso...pe0... tatiyampi kho so puriso aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m etadavoca ^a^V0.0130^ea^ -- ``gacchatha, bhante, yato ayyassa bhikkhaa dinnaa''ti. tatiyampi kho saa itthii aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m etadavoca -- ``nisiidatha, bhante, maa agamitthaa''ti.

[03]atha kho so puriso nikkhamitvaa bhikkhuu ujjhaapesi -- ``aya.m, bhante, ayyo upanando mayha.m pajaapatiyaa saddhi.m sayanighare nisinno. so mayaa ^a^T2.0354^ea^ uyyojiiyamaano na icchati gantu.m. bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto sabhojane kule anupakhajja ^a^P4.0095^ea^ nisajja.m kappessatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tva.m, upananda, sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajja.m kappesiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajja.m kappessasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 280^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajja.m kappeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 281^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^sabhojana.m^eb^ naama kula.m itthii ceva hoti puriso ca, itthii ca puriso ca ubho anikkhantaa honti, ubho aviitaraagaa.
[03]^b^anupakhajjaa^eb^ti anupavisitvaa.

[03]^b^nisajja.m kappeyyaa^eb^ti mahallake ghare pi.t.thasa"nghaa.tassa {pi.t.thisa"nghaa.tassa (syaa0)} hatthapaasa.m vijahitvaa nisiidati, aapatti paacittiyassa. khuddake ghare pi.t.thiva.msa.m atikkamitvaa nisiidati, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ sayanighare sayanigharasa~n~nii sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajja.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. sayanighare vematiko sabhojane kule ^a^M0.0128^ea^ anupakhajja nisajja.m kappeti, aapatti ^a^V0.0131^ea^ paacittiyassa. sayanighare nasayanigharasa~n~nii ^a^T2.0355^ea^ sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajja.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]nasayanighare sayanigharasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. nasayanighare vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. nasayanighare nasayanigharasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 283^b^.^eb^ anaapatti mahallake ghare pi.t.thasa"nghaa.tassa hatthapaasa.m avijahitvaa nisiidati, khuddake ghare pi.t.thiva.msa.m anatikkamitvaa nisiidati, bhikkhu dutiyo hoti, ubho nikkhantaa honti, ubho viitaraagaa, nasayanighare, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.

[03]^b^a~n~natra^eb^ ^a^M0.0135^ea^ ^b^samayaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa samaya.m.
[03]^b^ciivaradaanasamayo^eb^ naama anatthate kathine vassaanassa pacchimo maaso, atthate kathine pa~nca maasaa.
[03]^b^ciivarakaarasamayo^eb^ naama ciivare kayiramaane.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ nimantite nimantitasa~n~nii santa.m bhikkhu.m anaapucchaa purebhatta.m vaa pacchaabhatta.m vaa kulesu caaritta.m aapajjati, a~n~natra samayaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. nimantite vematiko santa.m bhikkhu.m anaapucchaa purebhatta.m vaa pacchaabhatta.m vaa kulesu caaritta.m aapajjati, a~n~natra samayaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. nimantite animantitasa~n~nii santa.m bhikkhu.m anaapucchaa purebhatta.m vaa pacchaabhatta.m vaa kulesu caaritta.m aapajjati, a~n~natra samayaa, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]animantite nimantitasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. animantite vematiko ^a^P4.0101^ea^, aapatti dukka.tassa. animantite animantitasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ anaapatti ^a^T2.0367^ea^ samaye, santa.m bhikkhu.m aapucchaa pavisati, asanta.m bhikkhu.m anaapucchaa pavisati, a~n~nassa gharena maggo hoti, gharuupacaarena maggo hoti, antaraaraama.m gacchati, bhikkhunupassaya.m gacchati, titthiyaseyya.m gacchati, pa.tikkamana.m gacchati, bhattiyaghara.m gacchati, aapadaasu, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] caarittasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0368^ea^ ^a^V0.0139^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. tena kho pana samayena mahaanaamassa sakkassa bhesajja.m ussanna.m hoti. atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m catumaasa.m {catummaasa.m (sii0) caatumaasa.m (syaa0)} bhesajjena pavaaretu''nti. ``saadhu saadhu ^a^M0.0136^ea^, mahaanaama! tena hi tva.m, mahaanaama, sa"ngha.m catumaasa.m bhesajjena pavaarehii''ti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, catumaasa.m bhesajjappaccayapavaara.na.m saaditunti.

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu mahaanaama.m sakka.m paritta.m bhesajja.m vi~n~naapenti. tatheva mahaanaamassa sakkassa bhesajja.m ussanna.m hoti. dutiyampi kho mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m aparampi catumaasa.m bhesajjena pavaaretu''nti. ``saadhu saadhu, mahaanaama! tena hi tva.m, mahaanaama, sa"ngha.m aparampi catumaasa.m bhesajjena pavaarehii''ti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, puna pavaara.nampi saaditunti.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0369^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu mahaanaama.m sakka.m paritta.myeva bhesajja.m vi~n~naapenti. tatheva mahaanaamassa sakkassa bhesajja.m ussanna.m hoti. tatiyampi kho mahaanaamo ^a^P4.0102^ea^ sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m yaavajiiva.m bhesajjena pavaaretu''nti. ``saadhu saadhu, mahaanaama! tena hi tva.m, mahaanaama, sa"ngha.m yaavajiiva.m bhesajjena pavaarehii''ti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, niccapavaara.nampi saaditunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu dunnivatthaa honti duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa. mahaanaamo sakko vattaa hoti -- ``kissa tumhe, bhante, dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa? nanu naama pabbajitena sunivatthena bhavitabba.m supaarutena aakappasampannenaa''ti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu mahaanaame sakke upanandhi.msu. atha kho chabbaggiyaana.m ^a^V0.0140^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kena nu kho maya.m upaayena mahaanaama.m sakka.m ma"nku kareyyaamaa''ti? atha kho chabbaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``mahaanaamena kho, aavuso, sakkena sa"ngho bhesajjena pavaarito. handa maya.m, aavuso, mahaanaama.m sakka.m ^a^M0.0137^ea^ sappi.m ^a^T2.0370^ea^ vi~n~naapemaa''ti. atha kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu yena mahaanaamo sakko tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa mahaanaama.m sakka.m etadavocu.m -- ``do.nena, aavuso, sappinaa attho''ti. ``ajja.nho, bhante, aagametha. manussaa vaja.m gataa sappi.m aaharitu.m. kaala.m aaharissathaa''ti {kaale harissathaati (syaa0)}.

[03]dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu mahaanaama.m sakka.m etadavocu.m -- ``do.nena, aavuso, sappinaa attho''ti. ``ajja.nho, bhante, aagametha. manussaa vaja.m gataa sappi.m aaharitu.m. kaala.m aaharissathaa''ti. ``ki.m pana tayaa, aavuso, adaatukaamena pavaaritena, ya.m tva.m pavaaretvaa na desii''ti! atha kho mahaanaamo sakko ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa -- `ajja.nho, bhante, aagamethaa'ti vuccamaanaa naagamessantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu mahaanaamassa sakkassa ujjhaayantassa khiyyantassa vipaacentassa. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu mahaanaamena sakkena -- `ajja.nho, bhante, aagamethaa'ti vuccamaanaa naagamessantii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, mahaanaamena sakkena -- ``ajja.nho, bhante, aagamethaa''ti vuccamaanaa naagamethaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, mahaanaamena sakkena -- ``ajja.nho, bhante aagamethaa''ti vuccamaanaa naagamessatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave ima.m sikkhaapada.m ^a^T2.0371^ea^ uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ ^b^``agilaanena bhikkhunaa catumaasappaccayapavaara.naa saaditabbaa^eb^ ^a^P4.0103^ea^, ^b^a~n~natra punapavaara.naaya, a~n~natra niccapavaara.naaya; tato ce uttari saadiyeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 307^b^.^eb^ ^b^agilaanena bhikkhunaa catumaasappaccayapavaara.naa saaditabbaa^eb^ti gilaanappaccayapavaara.naa saaditabbaa.
[03]^b^punapavaara.naapi saaditabbaa^eb^ti yadaa gilaano bhavissaami tadaa vi~n~naapessaamiiti.
[03]^b^niccapavaara.naapi saaditabbaa^eb^ti yadaa gilaano bhavissaami tadaa vi~n~naapessaamiiti.

[03]^b^tato^eb^ ^a^M0.0138^ea^ ^a^V0.0141^ea^ ^b^ce uttari saadiyeyyaa^eb^ti atthi pavaara.naa bhesajjapariyantaa na rattipariyantaa, atthi pavaara.naa rattipariyantaa na bhesajjapariyantaa, atthi pavaara.naa bhesajjapariyantaa ca rattipariyantaa ca, atthi pavaara.naa neva bhesajjapariyantaa na rattipariyantaa.

[03]^b^bhesajjapariyantaa^eb^ naama bhesajjaani pariggahitaani honti -- ``ettakehi bhesajjehi pavaaremii''ti. ^b^rattipariyantaa^eb^ naama rattiyo pariggahitaayo honti -- ``ettakaasu rattiisu pavaaremii''ti. ^b^bhesajjapariyantaa ca rattipariyantaa ca^eb^ naama bhesajjaani ca pariggahitaani honti rattiyo ca pariggahitaayo honti -- ``ettakehi bhesajjehi ettakaasu rattiisu pavaaremii''ti. ^b^neva bhesajjapariyantaa na rattipariyantaa^eb^ naama bhesajjaani ca apariggahitaani honti rattiyo ca apariggahitaayo honti.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ bhesajjapariyante ^a^T2.0372^ea^ -- yehi bhesajjehi pavaarito hoti taani bhesajjaani .thapetvaa a~n~naani bhesajjaani vi~n~naapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. rattipariyante -- yaasu rattiisu pavaarito hoti, taa rattiyo .thapetvaa a~n~naasu rattiisu vi~n~naapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. bhesajjapariyante ca rattipariyante ca -- yehi bhesajjehi pavaarito hoti, taani bhesajjaani .thapetvaa yaasu rattiisu pavaarito hoti, taa rattiyo .thapetvaa a~n~naani bhesajjaani a~n~naasu rattiisu vi~n~naapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. neva bhesajjapariyante na rattipariyante, anaapatti.

[03] 309^b^.^eb^ na bhesajjena kara.niiyena {kara.niiye (sii0 syaa0)} bhesajja.m vi~n~naapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. a~n~nena bhesajjena kara.niiyena a~n~na.m bhesajja.m vi~n~naapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. tatuttari tatuttarisa~n~nii bhesajja.m vi~n~naapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. tatuttari vematiko bhesajja.m vi~n~naapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. tatuttari natatuttarisa~n~nii bhesajja.m vi~n~naapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]natatuttari tatuttarisa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. natatuttari vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. natatuttari natatuttarisa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ anaapatti ^a^M0.0139^ea^ yehi bhesajjehi pavaarito hoti taani bhesajjaani vi~n~naapeti, yaasu rattiisu pavaarito hoti taasu rattiisu vi~n~naapeti ^a^T2.0373^ea^, ``imehi tayaa ^a^P4.0104^ea^ bhesajjehi pavaaritaamha ^a^V0.0142^ea^, amhaaka~nca iminaa ca iminaa ca bhesajjena attho''ti aacikkhitvaa vi~n~naapeti, ``yaasu tayaa rattiisu pavaaritaamha taayo ca rattiyo viitivattaa amhaaka~nca bhesajjena attho''ti aacikkhitvaa vi~n~naapeti, ~naatakaana.m pavaaritaana.m, a~n~nassatthaaya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] mahaanaamasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0374^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena raajaa pasenadi kosalo senaaya abbhuyyaato hoti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uyyutta.m sena.m dassanaaya agama.msu. addasaa kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo chabbaggiye bhikkhuu duuratova aagacchante. disvaana pakkosaapetvaa etadavoca -- ``kissa tumhe, bhante, aagatatthaa''ti? ``mahaaraajaana.m maya.m da.t.thukaamaa'' {mahaaraaja mahaaraajaana.m maya.m da.t.thukaamaa (ka0)} ti. ``ki.m, bhante, ma.m di.t.thena yuddhaabhinandina.m {yuddhaabhinandinaa (ka0)}; nanu bhagavaa passitabbo''ti? manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa uyyutta.m sena.m dassanaaya aagacchissanti! amhaakampi alaabhaa, amhaakampi dulladdha.m, ye maya.m aajiivassa hetu puttadaarassa kaara.naa senaaya aagacchaamaa''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uyyutta.m sena.m dassanaaya gacchissantii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, uyyutta.m sena.m dassanaaya gacchathaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, uyyutta.m sena.m dassanaaya gacchissatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... ^a^T2.0375^ea^ eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo^eb^ ^a^M0.0140^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhu uyyutta.m sena.m dassanaaya gaccheyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 312^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P4.0105^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno maatulo senaaya gilaano hoti ^a^V0.0143^ea^. so tassa bhikkhuno santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``aha~nhi senaaya gilaano. aagacchatu bhadanto. icchaami bhadantassa aagata''nti. atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m -- `na uyyutta.m sena.m dassanaaya gantabba'nti. aya~nca me maatulo senaaya gilaano. katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tathaaruupappaccayaa senaaya gantu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 313^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu uyyutta.m sena.m dassanaaya gaccheyya, a~n~natra tathaaruupappaccayaa, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 314^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^uyyuttaa^eb^ naama senaa gaamato nikkhamitvaa nivi.t.thaa vaa hoti payaataa vaa.

[03]^b^senaa^eb^ naama hatthii assaa rathaa pattii. dvaadasapuriso hatthii, tipuriso asso, catupuriso ratho, cattaaro purisaa sarahatthaa patti. dassanaaya gacchati, aapatti dukka.tassa. yattha .thito passati, aapatti ^a^T2.0376^ea^ paacittiyassa. dassanuupacaara.m vijahitvaa punappuna.m passati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^a~n~natra tathaaruupappaccayaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa tathaaruupappaccaya.m.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ uyyutte uyyuttasa~n~nii dassanaaya gacchati, a~n~natra tathaaruupappaccayaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. uyyutte vematiko dassanaaya gacchati, a~n~natra tathaaruupappaccayaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. uyyutte anuyyuttasa~n~nii dassanaaya gacchati, a~n~natra tathaaruupappaccayaa, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]ekameka.m ^a^M0.0141^ea^ dassanaaya gacchati, aapatti dukka.tassa. yattha .thito passati, aapatti dukka.tassa. dassanuupacaara.m vijahitvaa punappuna.m passati, aapatti dukka.tassa. anuyyutte uyyuttasa~n~nii ^a^V0.0144^ea^, aapatti dukka.tassa. anuyyutte vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. anuyyutte anuyyuttasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ anaapatti aaraame .thito passati, bhikkhussa .thitokaasa.m vaa nisinnokaasa.m vaa nipannokaasa.m vaa aagacchati, pa.tipatha.m gacchanto passati, tathaaruupappaccayaa, aapadaasu, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] uyyuttasenaasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0377^ea^ ^a^P4.0106^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sati kara.niiye sena.m gantvaa atirekatiratta.m senaaya vasanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa senaaya vasissanti! amhaakampi alaabhaa, amhaakampi dulladdha.m, ye maya.m aajiivassa hetu puttadaarassa kaara.naa senaaya pa.tivasaamaa''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu atirekatiratta.m senaaya vasissantii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, atirekatiratta.m senaaya vasathaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, atirekatiratta.m senaaya vasissatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 318^b^.^eb^ ^b^``siyaa ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo sena.m gamanaaya, dirattatiratta.m tena bhikkhunaa senaaya vasitabba.m. tato ce uttari.m vaseyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 319^b^.^eb^ ^b^siyaa ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo sena.m gamanaayaa^eb^ti ^a^T2.0378^ea^ siyaa paccayo siyaa kara.niiya.m.
[03]^b^dirattatiratta.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0142^ea^ ^a^V0.0145^ea^ ^b^tena bhikkhunaa senaaya vasitabba^eb^nti dvetisso rattiyo vasitabba.m.
[03]^b^tato ce uttari vaseyyaa^eb^ti catutthe divase attha"ngate suuriye senaaya vasati, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ atirekatiratte atirekasa~n~nii senaaya vasati, aapatti paacittiyassa. atirekatiratte vematiko senaaya vasati, aapatti paacittiyassa. atirekatiratte uunakasa~n~nii senaaya vasati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]uunakatiratte atirekasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. uunakatiratte vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. uunakatiratte uunakasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ anaapatti dvetisso rattiyo vasati, uunakadvetisso rattiyo vasati, dve rattiyo vasitvaa tatiyaaya rattiyaa puraaru.naa nikkhamitvaa puna vasati, gilaano vasati, gilaanassa kara.niiyena vasati, senaa ^a^P4.0107^ea^ vaa pa.tisenaaya ruddhaa hoti, kenaci palibuddho hoti, aapadaasu, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] senaavaasasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0379^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu dirattatiratta.m senaaya vasamaanaa uyyodhikampi balaggampi senaabyuuhampi aniikadassanampi gacchanti. a~n~nataropi chabbaggiyo bhikkhu uyyodhika.m gantvaa ka.n.dena pa.tividdho hoti. manussaa ta.m bhikkhu.m uppa.n.desu.m -- ``kacci, bhante, suyuddha.m ahosi, kati te lakkhaani laddhaanii''ti? so bhikkhu tehi manussehi uppa.n.diiyamaano ma"nku ahosi. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa uyyodhika.m dassanaaya aagacchissanti! amhaakampi alaabhaa, amhaakampi dulladdha.m, ye maya.m aajiivassa hetu ^a^M0.0143^ea^ puttadaarassa kaara.naa uyyodhika.m aagacchaamaa''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m ^a^V0.0146^ea^. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uyyodhika.m dassanaaya gacchissantii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, uyyodhika.m dassanaaya gacchathaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, uyyodhika.m dassanaaya gacchissatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0380^ea^, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 323^b^.^eb^ ^b^``dirattatiratta.m ce bhikkhu senaaya vasamaano uyyodhika.m vaa balagga.m vaa senaabyuuha.m vaa aniikadassana.m vaa gaccheyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 324^b^.^eb^ ^b^dirattatiratta.m ce bhikkhu senaaya vasamaano^eb^ti dvetisso rattiyo vasamaano.
[03]^b^uyyodhika.m^eb^ naama yattha sampahaaro dissati.
[03]^b^balagga.m^eb^ naama ettakaa hatthii, ettakaa assaa, ettakaa rathaa, ettakaa pattii.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0382^ea^ ^a^V0.0148^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa cetiyesu caarika.m caramaano yena bhaddavatikaa tena paayaasi. addasa.msu kho gopaalakaa pasupaalakaa kassakaa pathaavino bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``maa kho, bhante, bhagavaa ambatittha.m agamaasi. ambatitthe, bhante, ja.tilassa assame naago pa.tivasati iddhimaa aasiviso {aasiiviso (sii0 syaa0)} ghoraviso. so bhagavanta.m maa vihe.thesii''ti. eva.m vutte bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho gopaalakaa pasupaalakaa kassakaa pathaavino bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``maa kho, bhante, bhagavaa ambatittha.m agamaasi. ambatitthe, bhante, ja.tilassa assame naago pa.tivasati iddhimaa aasiviso ghoraviso. so bhagavanta.m maa vihe.thesii''ti. tatiyampi kho bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena kosambii tadavasari. atha kho kosambikaa upaasakaa bhagavato paccuggamana.m karitvaa yenaayasmaa saagato tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saagata.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho kosambikaa ^a^V0.0149^ea^ upaasakaa aayasmanta.m saagata.m etadavocu.m -- ``ki.m, bhante, ayyaana.m dullabha~nca manaapa~nca, ki.m pa.tiyaademaa''ti? eva.m vutte chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu kosambike upaasake etadavocu.m -- ``atthaavuso, kaapotikaa naama pasannaa bhikkhuuna.m dullabhaa ca manaapaa ca, ta.m pa.tiyaadethaa''ti. atha kho kosambikaa upaasakaa ghare ghare kaapotika.m pasanna.m pa.tiyaadetvaa aayasmanta.m saagata.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tha.m disvaana aayasmanta.m saagata.m etadavocu.m -- ``pivatu, bhante, ayyo saagato kaapotika.m pasanna.m, pivatu ^a^T2.0384^ea^, bhante, ayyo saagato kaapotika.m pasanna''nti. atha kho aayasmaa saagato ghare ghare kaapotika.m pasanna.m pivitvaa nagaramhaa nikkhamanto nagaradvaare paripati.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0395^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa bhaggesu viharati su.msumaaragire {su.msumaaragire (sii0 syaa0) sa.msumaaragire (ka0)} bhesaka.laavane migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu hemantike kaale a~n~natara.m mahanta.m susiraka.t.tha.m joti.m samaadahitvaa visibbesu.m. tasmi~nca susire ka.nhasappo agginaa santatto nikkhamitvaa bhikkhuu paripaatesi. bhikkhuu taha.m taha.m upadhaavi.msu. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu joti.m samaadahitvaa visibbessantii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu joti.m samaadahitvaa visibbentiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave ^a^V0.0156^ea^, moghapurisaa joti.m samaadahitvaa visibbessanti! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu visibbanaapekkho joti.m samaadaheyya vaa samaadahaapeyya vaa, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu gilaanaa honti. gilaanapucchakaa bhikkhuu gilaane bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``kaccaavuso, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya''nti? ``pubbe maya.m, aavuso, joti.m samaadahitvaa visibbema; tena ^a^T2.0396^ea^ no phaasu hoti. idaani pana ``bhagavataa pa.tikkhitta''nti kukkuccaayantaa ^a^M0.0153^ea^ na visibbema, tena no na phaasu hotii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanena bhikkhunaa joti.m samaadahitvaa vaa samaadahaapetvaa vaa visibbetu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu agilaano visibbanaapekkho joti.m samaadaheyya^eb^ ^a^P4.0116^ea^ ^b^vaa samaadahaapeyya vaa, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu padiipepi jotikepi jantaagharepi kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tathaaruupappaccayaa joti.m samaadahitu.m samaadahaapetu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 353^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu agilaano visibbanaapekkho joti.m samaadaheyya vaa samaadahaapeyya vaa, a~n~natra tathaaruupappaccayaa, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 354^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^agilaano^eb^ ^a^V0.0157^ea^ naama yassa vinaa agginaa phaasu hoti.
[03]^b^gilaano^eb^ naama yassa vinaa agginaa na phaasu hoti.
[03]^b^visibbanaapekkho^eb^ti tappitukaamo.
[03]^b^joti^eb^ naama aggi vuccati.
[03]^b^samaadaheyyaa^eb^ti saya.m samaadahati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^samaadahaapeyyaa^eb^ti ^a^T2.0397^ea^ a~n~na.m aa.naapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. saki.m aa.natto bahukampi samaadahati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^a~n~natra tathaa ruupappaccayaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa tathaaruupappaccaya.m.

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ agilaano agilaanasa~n~nii visibbanaapekkho joti.m samaadahati vaa samaadahaapeti vaa, a~n~natra tathaaruupappaccayaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. agilaano vematiko visibbanaapekkho joti.m samaadahati ^a^M0.0154^ea^ vaa samaadahaapeti vaa, a~n~natra tathaaruupappaccayaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. agilaano gilaanasa~n~nii visibbanaapekkho joti.m samaadahati vaa samaadahaapeti vaa, a~n~natra tathaaruupappaccayaa, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]pa.tilaata.m ukkhipati, aapatti dukka.tassa. gilaano agilaanasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. gilaano vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. gilaano gilaanasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 356^b^.^eb^ anaapatti gilaanassa, a~n~nena kata.m visibbeti, viitaccita"ngaara.m visibbeti, padiipe jotike jantaaghare tathaaruupappaccayaa, aapadaasu, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] jotikasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 357^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0398^ea^ ^a^V0.0158^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu tapode nahaayanti. tena kho pana samayena {atha kho (sii0 syaa0)} raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro ``siisa.m nahaayissaamii''ti tapoda.m ^a^P4.0117^ea^ gantvaa -- ``yaavaayyaa nahaayantii''ti ekamanta.m pa.timaanesi. bhikkhuu yaava samandhakaaraa nahaayi.msu. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro vikaale siisa.m nahaayitvaa, nagaradvaare thakite bahinagare vasitvaa, kaalasseva asambhinnena vilepanena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kissa tva.m, mahaaraaja, kaalasseva aagato asambhinnena vilepanenaa''ti? atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. atha kho bhagavaa raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa ^a^M0.0155^ea^ bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu raajaanampi passitvaa na matta.m ^a^T2.0399^ea^ jaanitvaa nahaayantii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa raajaanampi passitvaa na matta.m jaanitvaa nahaayissanti! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 358^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu u.nhasamaye pari.laahasamaye kukkuccaayantaa na nahaayanti, sedagatena gattena sayanti. ciivarampi senaasanampi dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, u.nhasamaye pari.laahasamaye orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]^b^``yo^eb^ ^a^V0.0159^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhu orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayeyya, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. diya.d.dho maaso seso gimhaananti^eb^ {gimhaana.m (itipi)} ^b^vassaanassa pa.thamo maaso iccete a.d.dhateyyamaasaa u.nhasamayo pari.laahasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m ^a^P4.0118^ea^ bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu gilaanaa honti. gilaanapucchakaa bhikkhuu gilaane bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``kaccaavuso, khamaniiya.m, kacci ^a^T2.0400^ea^ yaapaniiya''nti? ``pubbe maya.m, aavuso, orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayaama, tena no phaasu hoti; idaani pana ``bhagavataa pa.tikkhitta''nti kukkuccaayantaa na nahaayaama, tena no na phaasu hotii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanena bhikkhunaa orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayeyya, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. diya.d.dho maaso seso gimhaananti^eb^ {gimhaana.m (itipi)} ^b^vassaanassa^eb^ ^a^M0.0156^ea^ ^b^pa.thamo maaso iccete a.d.dhateyyamaasaa u.nhasamayo, pari.laahasamayo, gilaanasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu navakamma.m katvaa kukkuccaayantaa na nahaayanti. te sedagatena gattena sayanti. ciivarampi senaasanampi dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kammasamaye orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayeyya, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. diya.d.dho maaso seso gimhaananti vassaanassa pa.thamo maaso iccete a.d.dhateyyamaasaa u.nhasamayo, pari.laahasamayo, gilaanasamayo, kammasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0401^ea^ ^a^V0.0160^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu addhaana.m gantvaa kukkuccaayantaa na nahaayanti. te sedagatena gattena sayanti. ciivarampi senaasanampi dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, addhaanagamanasamaye orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayeyya, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. diya.d.dho maaso seso gimhaananti vassaanassa pa.thamo maaso iccete a.d.dhateyyamaasaa u.nhasamayo, pari.laahasamayo, gilaanasamayo, kammasamayo, addhaanagamanasamayo -- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu ajjhokaase ciivarakamma.m karontaa sarajena vaatena oki.n.naa honti. devo ca thoka.m thoka.m phusaayati. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na nahaayanti, kilinnena ^a^M0.0157^ea^ gattena sayanti. ciivarampi senaasanampi ^a^P4.0119^ea^ dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vaatavu.t.thisamaye orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayeyya, a~n~natra samayaa, paacittiya.m. tatthaaya.m samayo. diya.d.dho maaso seso gimhaananti vassaanassa pa.thamo maaso iccete a.d.dhateyyamaasaa u.nhasamayo, pari.laahasamayo, gilaanasamayo, kammasamayo, addhaanagamanasamayo, vaatavu.t.thisamayo^eb^ ^a^T2.0402^ea^ ^b^-- aya.m tattha samayo''^eb^ti.
[03] 364^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^orenaddhamaasa^eb^nti uunakaddhamaasa.m.
[03]^b^nahaayeyyaa^eb^ti cu.n.nena vaa mattikaaya vaa nahaayati, payoge payoge dukka.ta.m. nahaanapariyosaane, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^a~n~natra^eb^ ^a^V0.0161^ea^ ^b^samayaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa samaya.m.
[03]^b^u.nhasamayo^eb^ naama diya.d.dho maaso seso gimhaana.m. ^b^pari.laahasamayo^eb^ naama vassaanassa pa.thamo maaso ``iccete a.d.dhateyyamaasaa u.nhasamayo pari.laahasamayo''ti nahaayitabba.m.
[03]^b^gilaanasamayo^eb^ naama yassa vinaa nahaanena na phaasu hoti. gilaanasamayoti nahaayitabba.m.
[03]^b^kammasamayo^eb^ naama antamaso parive.nampi samma.t.tha.m hoti. ``kammasamayo''ti nahaayitabba.m.
[03]^b^addhaanagamanasamayo^eb^ naama ``addhayojana.m gacchissaamii''ti nahaayitabba.m, gacchantena nahaayitabba.m, gatena nahaayitabba.m.
[03]^b^vaatavu.t.thisamayo^eb^ naama bhikkhuu sarajena vaatena oki.n.naa honti, dve vaa tii.ni vaa udakaphusitaani kaaye patitaani honti. ``vaatavu.t.thisamayo''ti nahaayitabba.m.

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ uunakaddhamaase uunakasa~n~nii, a~n~natra samayaa, nahaayati, aapatti paacittiyassa. uunakaddhamaase vematiko, a~n~natra samayaa, nahaayati, aapatti ^a^M0.0158^ea^ paacittiyassa. uunakaddhamaase atirekasa~n~nii, a~n~natra samayaa, nahaayati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]atirekaddhamaase uunakasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. atirekaddhamaase vematiko ^a^T2.0403^ea^, aapatti dukka.tassa. atirekaddhamaase atirekasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 366^b^.^eb^ anaapatti samaye, addhamaasa.m nahaayati, atirekaddhamaasa.m nahaayati, paara.m gacchanto nahaayati, sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu, aapadaasu, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] nahaanasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 367^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0404^ea^ ^a^P4.0120^ea^ ^a^V0.0162^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu ca paribbaajakaa ca saaketaa saavatthi.m addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. antaraamagge coraa nikkhamitvaa te acchindi.msu. saavatthiyaa raajabha.taa nikkhamitvaa te core sabha.n.de gahetvaa bhikkhuuna.m santike duuta.m paahesu.m -- ``aagacchantu, bhadantaa, saka.m saka.m ciivara.m sa~njaanitvaa ga.nhantuu''ti. bhikkhuu na sa~njaananti. te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa attano attano ciivara.m na sa~njaanissantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuuna.m tadanucchavika.m tadanulomika.m dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaami dasa atthavase pa.ticca -- sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya, sa"nghaphaasutaaya...pe0... saddhamma.t.thitiyaa, vinayaanuggahaaya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ ^b^``nava.m pana bhikkhunaa ciivaralaabhena ti.n.na.m dubba.n.nakara.naana.m a~n~natara.m dubba.n.nakara.na.m aadaatabba.m -- niila.m vaa kaddama.m vaa kaa.lasaama.m vaa. anaadaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0159^ea^ ^b^ce bhikkhu ti.n.na.m dubba.n.nakara.naana.m a~n~natara.m dubba.n.nakara.na.m^eb^ ^a^T2.0405^ea^ ^b^nava.m ciivara.m paribhu~njeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 369^b^.^eb^ ^b^nava.m^eb^ naama akatakappa.m vuccati.
[03]^b^ciivara.m^eb^ naama channa.m ciivaraana.m a~n~natara.m ciivara.m.
[03]^b^ti.n.na.m dubba.n.nakara.naana.m a~n~natara.m dubba.n.nakara.na.m aadaatabba^eb^nti antamaso kusaggenapi aadaatabba.m.
[03]^b^niila.m^eb^ naama dve niilaani -- ka.msaniila.m, palaasaniila.m.
[03]^b^kaddamo^eb^ naama odako vuccati.
[03]^b^kaa.lasaama.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0163^ea^ naama ya.mki~nci kaa.lasaamaka.m {kaa.laka.m (sii0 syaa0)}.

[03]^b^anaadaa ce bhikkhu ti.n.na.m dubba.n.nakara.naana.m a~n~natara.m dubba.n.nakara.na^eb^nti antamaso kusaggenapi anaadiyitvaa ti.n.na.m ^a^P4.0121^ea^ dubba.n.nakara.naana.m a~n~natara.m dubba.n.nakara.na.m nava.m ciivara.m paribhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 370^b^.^eb^ anaadinne anaadinnasa~n~nii paribhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. anaadinne vematiko paribhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. anaadinne aadinnasa~n~nii paribhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]aadinne anaadinnasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. aadinne vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. aadinne aadinnasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ anaapattiaadiyitvaa paribhu~njati, kappo na.t.tho hoti, kappakatokaaso ji.n.no hoti, kappakatena akappakata.m sa.msibbita.m hoti, agga.le anuvaate paribha.n.de, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] dubba.n.nakara.nasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 372^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0406^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa upanando ^a^M0.0160^ea^ sakyaputto bhaatuno saddhivihaarikassa bhikkhuno saama.m ciivara.m vikappetvaa appaccuddhaara.na.m {apaccuddhaaraka.m (sii0 syaa0)} paribhu~njati. atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi -- ``aya.m, aavuso, aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto mayha.m ciivara.m saama.m vikappetvaa appaccuddhaara.na.m paribhu~njatii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa saama.m ciivara.m vikappetvaa appaccuddhaara.na.m paribhu~njissatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tva.m, upananda, bhikkhussa saama.m ciivara.m vikappetvaa appaccuddhaara.na.m paribhu~njasiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, bhikkhussa saama.m ciivara.m ^a^V0.0164^ea^ vikappetvaa appaccuddhaara.na.m paribhu~njissasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
