[03] 401^b^.^eb^ anaapatti -- ``sa"nghassa bha.n.dana.m vaa kalaho vaa viggaho vaa vivaado vaa bhavissatii''ti naaroceti, ``sa"nghabhedo vaa sa"ngharaaji vaa bhavissatii''ti naaroceti, ``aya.m kakkha.lo pharuso jiivitantaraaya.m vaa brahmacariyantaraaya.m vaa karissatii''ti naaroceti, a~n~ne patiruupe bhikkhuu apassanto naaroceti, nachaadetukaamo naaroceti, ``pa~n~naayissati sakena kammenaa''ti naaroceti, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] du.t.thullasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0421^ea^ ^a^M0.0169^ea^ ^a^V0.0173^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. {ida.m vatthu mahaava0 99} tena kho pana samayena raajagahe sattarasavaggiyaa daarakaa sahaayakaa honti. upaalidaarako tesa.m paamokkho hoti. atha kho upaalissa maataapituuna.m etadahosi -- ``kena nu kho upaayena upaali amhaaka.m accayena sukha~nca jiiveyya na ca kilameyyaa''ti? atha kho upaalissa maataapituuna.m etadahosi -- ``sace kho upaali lekha.m sikkheyya, eva.m kho upaali amhaaka.m accayena sukha~nca jiiveyya, na ca kilameyyaa''ti. atha kho upaalissa maataapituuna.m etadahosi -- ``sace kho upaali lekha.m sikkhissati, a"nguliyo ^a^P4.0129^ea^ dukkhaa bhavissanti. sace kho upaali ga.nana.m sikkheyya, eva.m kho upaali amhaaka.m accayena sukha~nca jiiveyya na ca kilameyyaa''ti. atha kho upaalissa maataapituuna.m etadahosi -- ``sace kho upaali ga.nana.m sikkhissati, urassa dukkho bhavissati. sace kho upaali ruupa.m sikkheyya, eva.m kho upaali amhaaka.m accayena sukha~nca jiiveyya na ca kilameyyaa''ti. atha kho upaalissa maataapituuna.m etadahosi -- ``sace kho upaali ruupa.m sikkhissati, akkhiini dukkhaa bhavissanti. ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa sukhasiilaa sukhasamaacaaraa subhojanaani bhu~njitvaa nivaatesu sayanesu ^a^T2.0422^ea^ sayanti. sace kho upaali sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya, eva.m kho upaali amhaaka.m accayena sukha~nca jiiveyya, na ca kilameyyaa''ti.

[03]assosi kho upaalidaarako maataapituuna.m ima.m kathaasallaapa.m. atha kho upaalidaarako yena te daarakaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te daarake etadavoca -- ``etha maya.m, ayyaa, sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajissaamaa''ti. ``sace kho tva.m, ayya, pabbajissasi, eva.m mayampi pabbajissaamaa''ti. atha kho te daarakaa ekamekassa maataapitaro upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``anujaanaatha ma.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. atha kho tesa.m daarakaana.m maataapitaro -- ``sabbepime daarakaa samaanacchandaa kalyaa.naadhippaayaa''ti anujaani.msu. te bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci.msu. te bhikkhuu pabbaajesu.m upasampaadesu.m. te rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya rodanti -- ``yaagu.m detha ^a^M0.0170^ea^, bhatta.m detha, khaadaniiya.m dethaa''ti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``aagametha, aavuso, yaava ratti vibhaayati. sace yaagu bhavissati, pivissatha. sace bhatta.m bhavissati, bhu~njissatha. sace khaadaniiya.m bhavissati, khaadissatha. no ce bhavissati yaagu vaa bhatta.m vaa khaadaniiya.m vaa, pi.n.daaya caritvaa bhu~njissathaa''ti. evampi kho ^a^V0.0174^ea^ te bhikkhuu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaanaa rodantiyeva -- ``yaagu.m detha, bhatta.m detha, khaadaniiya.m dethaa''ti. senaasana.m uuhadantipi ummihantipi.

[03]assosi ^a^T2.0423^ea^ kho bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya daarakasadda.m. sutvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho so, aananda, daarakasaddo''ti? atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m ^a^P4.0130^ea^ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu jaana.m uunaviisativassa.m puggala.m upasampaadentii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa jaana.m uunaviisativassa.m puggala.m upasampaadessanti! uunakaviisativasso, bhikkhave, puggalo akkhamo hoti siitassa u.nhassa jighacchaaya pipaasaaya .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m anadhivaasakajaatiko hoti. viisativassova kho, bhikkhave, puggalo khamo hoti siitassa u.nhassa...pe0... paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko hoti. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu jaana.m uunaviisativassa.m puggala.m upasampaadeyya, so ca puggalo anupasampanno^eb^ ^a^T2.0424^ea^, ^b^te ca bhikkhuu gaarayhaa, ida.m tasmi.m paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 404^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^jaanaati^eb^ naama saama.m vaa jaanaati, a~n~ne vaa tassa aarocenti, so vaa aaroceti.
[03]^b^uunaviisativasso^eb^ ^a^M0.0171^ea^ naama appattaviisativasso.

[03]``upasampaadessaamii''ti ga.na.m vaa aacariya.m vaa patta.m vaa ciivara.m vaa pariyesati, siima.m vaa sammannati {sammanati (ka0)}, aapatti dukka.tassa. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m. dviihi kammavaacaahi dukka.taa. kammavaacaapariyosaane upajjhaayassa aapatti paacittiyassa. ga.nassa ca aacariyassa ca aapatti dukka.tassa.

[03] 405^b^.^eb^ uunaviisativasse ^a^V0.0175^ea^ uunaviisativassasa~n~nii upasampaadeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. uunaviisativasse vematiko upasampaadeti, aapatti dukka.tassa. uunaviisativasse paripu.n.naviisativassasa~n~nii upasampaadeti, anaapatti. paripu.n.naviisativasse uunaviisativassasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. paripu.n.naviisativasse vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. paripu.n.naviisativasse paripu.n.naviisativassasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 406^b^.^eb^ anaapatti uunaviisativassa.m paripu.n.naviisativassasa~n~nii upasampaadeti, paripu.n.naviisativassa.m paripu.n.naviisativassasa~n~nii upasampaadeti, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] uunaviisativassasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0425^ea^ ^a^P4.0131^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro sattho raajagahaa pa.tiyaaloka.m gantukaamo hoti. a~n~nataro bhikkhu te manusse etadavoca -- ``ahampaayasmantehi saddhi.m gamissaamii''ti. ``maya.m kho, bhante, su"nka.m pariharissaamaa''ti. ``pajaanaathaavuso''ti. assosu.m kho kammiyaa {kammikaa (sii0 syaa0)} -- ``sattho kira su"nka.m pariharissatii''ti. te magge pariyu.t.thi.msu. atha kho te kammikaa ta.m sattha.m gahetvaa acchinditvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``kissa tva.m, bhante, jaana.m theyyasatthena saddhi.m gacchasii''ti? palibundhetvaa mu~nci.msu. atha kho so bhikkhu saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m ^a^M0.0172^ea^ aarocesi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu jaana.m theyyasatthena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjissatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, jaana.m theyyasatthena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjasiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, jaana.m theyyasatthena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjissasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo^eb^ ^a^V0.0176^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhu jaana.m theyyasatthena^eb^ ^a^T2.0426^ea^ ^b^saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjeyya, antamaso gaamantarampi, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 409^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^jaanaati^eb^ naama saama.m vaa jaanaati, a~n~ne vaa tassa aarocenti, so vaa aaroceti.
[03]^b^theyyasattho^eb^ naama coraa katakammaa vaa honti akatakammaa vaa, raajaana.m vaa theyya.m gacchanti su"nka.m vaa pariharanti.
[03]^b^saddhi^eb^nti ekato.
[03]^b^sa.mvidhaayaa^eb^ti -- ``gacchaamaavuso, gacchaama bhante; gacchaama bhante, gacchaamaavuso, ajja vaa hiyyo vaa pare vaa gacchaamaa''ti sa.mvidahati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
[03]^b^antamaso gaamantarampii^eb^ti kukku.tasampaate gaame gaamantare gaamantare aapatti paacittiyassa. agaamake ara~n~ne addhayojane addhayojane aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ theyyasatthe ^a^P4.0132^ea^ theyyasatthasa~n~nii sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjati, antamaso gaamantarampi, aapatti paacittiyassa. theyyasatthe vematiko sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjati, antamaso gaamantarampi, aapatti dukka.tassa. theyyasatthe atheyyasatthasa~n~nii sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjati, antamaso gaamantarampi, anaapatti. bhikkhu sa.mvidahati, manussaa na sa.mvidahanti, aapatti ^a^M0.0173^ea^ dukka.tassa. atheyyasatthe theyyasatthasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. atheyyasatthe vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. atheyyasatthe atheyyasatthasa~n~nii ^a^T2.0427^ea^ anaapatti.
[03] 411^b^.^eb^ anaapatti asa.mvidahitvaa gacchati, manussaa sa.mvidahanti bhikkhu na sa.mvidahati, visa"nketena gacchati, aapadaasu, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] theyyasatthasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0428^ea^ ^a^V0.0177^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu janapade saavatthi.m gacchanto a~n~natarena gaamadvaarena atikkamati. a~n~nataraa itthii saamikena saha bha.n.ditvaa gaamato nikkhamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m passitvaa etadavoca -- ``kaha.m, bhante, ayyo gamissatii''ti? ``saavatthi.m kho aha.m, bhagini, gamissaamii''ti. ``aha.m ayyena saddhi.m gamissaamii''ti. ``eyyaasi, bhaginii''ti. atha kho tassaa itthiyaa saamiko gaamato nikkhamitvaa manusse pucchi -- ``apaayyo {apayyaa (sii0 syaa0)} evaruupi.m itthi.m passeyyaathaa''ti? ``esaayyo, pabbajitena saha gacchatii''ti. atha kho so puriso anubandhitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m gahetvaa aako.tetvaa mu~nci. atha kho so bhikkhu a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule padhuupento nisiidi. atha kho saa itthii ta.m purisa.m etadavoca -- ``naayyo so bhikkhu ma.m nippaatesi; apica, ahameva tena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m gacchaami; akaarako so bhikkhu; gaccha, na.m khamaapehii''ti. atha kho so puriso ta.m bhikkhu.m khamaapesi. atha kho so bhikkhu saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu maatugaamena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjissatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, maatugaamena ^a^T2.0429^ea^ saddhi.m ^a^P4.0133^ea^ sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjasiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, maatugaamena ^a^M0.0174^ea^ saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjissasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m, uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 413^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu maatugaamena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjeyya, antamaso gaamantarampi, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 414^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^maatugaamo^eb^ naama manussitthii, na yakkhii na petii na tiracchaanagataa vi~n~nuu pa.tibalaa subhaasitadubbhaasita.m du.t.thullaadu.t.thulla.m aajaanitu.m.
[03]^b^saddhi^eb^nti ^a^V0.0178^ea^ ekato.
[03]^b^sa.mvidhaayaa^eb^ti -- ``gacchaama bhagini, gacchaamaayya, gacchaamaayya, gacchaama bhagini, ajja vaa hiyyo vaa pare vaa gacchaamaa''ti sa.mvidahati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
[03]^b^antamaso gaamantarampii^eb^ti kukku.tasampaate gaame gaamantare gaamantare aapatti paacittiyassa. agaamake ara~n~ne addhayojane addhayojane aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 415^b^.^eb^ maatugaame maatugaamasa~n~nii sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjati, antamaso gaamantarampi, aapatti paacittiyassa. maatugaame vematiko sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjati, antamaso gaamantarampi, aapatti paacittiyassa. maatugaame amaatugaamasa~n~nii sa.mvidhaaya ^a^T2.0430^ea^ ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjati, antamaso gaamantarampi, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]bhikkhu sa.mvidahati maatugaamo na sa.mvidahati, aapatti dukka.tassa. yakkhiyaa vaa petiyaa pa.n.dakena vaa tiracchaanagatamanussaviggahitthiyaa vaa saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjati, antamaso gaamantarampi, aapatti dukka.tassa. amaatugaame maatugaamasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. amaatugaame vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. amaatugaame amaatugaamasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 416^b^.^eb^ anaapatti ^a^M0.0175^ea^ asa.mvidahitvaa gacchati, maatugaamo sa.mvidahati bhikkhu na sa.mvidahati, visa"nketena gacchati, aapadaasu, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] sa.mvidhaanasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 417^b^.^eb^ {ida.m vatthu cuu.lava0 65; ma0 ni0 1.234} tena ^a^T2.0431^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena ari.t.thassa naama bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa ^a^P4.0134^ea^ {gandhabaadhipubbassa (syaa0 ka0)} evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti. assosu.m kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu ^a^V0.0179^ea^ -- ``ari.t.thassa kira naama bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu yena ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m kira te, aavuso ari.t.tha, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti? ``eva.mbyaakho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti.

[03]``maa, aavuso ari.t.tha, eva.m avaca. maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi. na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m {abbhaacikkhana.m (itipi)}. na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya ^a^T2.0432^ea^. anekapariyaayenaavuso ari.t.tha, antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa. ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ^a^M0.0176^ea^ ettha bhiyyo. ma.msapesuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa...pe0... ti.nukkuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... a"ngaarakaasuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... supinakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... yaacitakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... rukkhaphaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... asisuunuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... sattisuuluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo''ti.

[03]evampi kho ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tehi bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano tatheva ta.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa voharati -- ``eva.mbyaakho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, -- `yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti. yato ca kho te bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetu.m, atha kho te bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha ^a^T2.0433^ea^ kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane ^a^P4.0135^ea^ etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira te, ari.t.tha, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti ^a^V0.0180^ea^? ``eva.mbyaakho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti.

[03]kassa nu kho naama tva.m, moghapurisa, mayaa eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaasi? nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa. ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...pe0... ma.msapesuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... ti.nukkuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... a"ngaarakaasuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... supinakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... yaacitakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... rukkhaphaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... asisuunuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... sattisuuluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa ^a^M0.0177^ea^ vuttaa mayaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. atha ca pana tva.m, moghapurisa, attanaa duggahitena amhe ^a^T2.0434^ea^ ceva abbhaacikkhasi, attaana~nca kha.nasi, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavasi. ta~nhi te, moghapurisa, bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0.... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 418^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi evamassa vacaniiyo -- `maayasmaa eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya, anekapariyaayenaavuso, antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa, ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaayaa'ti. eva~nca {eva~nca pana (ka0)} so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano tatheva pagga.nheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasitabbo tassa pa.tinissaggaaya. yaavatatiya~nce samanubhaasiyamaano ta.m pa.tinissajjeyya, icceta.m kusala.m, no ce pa.tinissajjeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 419^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^eva.m vadeyyaa^eb^ti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti.
[03]^b^so^eb^ ^a^V0.0181^ea^ ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti yo so eva.mvaadii bhikkhu.

[03]^b^bhikkhuuhii^eb^ti a~n~nehi ^a^T2.0435^ea^ bhikkhuuhi. ye passanti ye su.nanti tehi vattabbo -- ``maayasmaa eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya, anekapariyaayenaavuso antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa. ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaayaa''ti. dutiyampi vattabbo. tatiyampi vattabbo. sace pa.tinissajjati ^a^P4.0136^ea^, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce pa.tinissajjati, aapatti dukka.tassa. sutvaa na vadanti, aapatti dukka.tassa. so bhikkhu ^b^sa"nghamajjhampi^eb^ ^a^M0.0178^ea^ aaka.d.dhitvaa vattabbo -- ``maayasmaa eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya, anekapariyaayenaavuso antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa. ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaayaa''ti. dutiyampi vattabbo. tatiyampi vattabbo. sace pa.tinissajjati, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce pa.tinissajjati, aapatti dukka.tassa. so bhikkhu samanubhaasitabbo. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, samanubhaasitabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 420^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamassa bhikkhuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. so ta.m di.t.thi.m na pa.tinissajjati. yadi ^a^T2.0436^ea^ sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m samanubhaaseyya -- tassaa di.t.thiyaa pa.tinissaggaaya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamassa bhikkhuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. so ta.m di.t.thi.m na pa.tinissajjati. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m samanubhaasati tassaa di.t.thiyaa pa.tinissaggaaya. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno samanubhaasanaa, tassaa di.t.thiyaa pa.tinissaggaaya, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamassa bhikkhuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti ^a^V0.0182^ea^. so ta.m di.t.thi.m na pa.tinissajjati. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m samanubhaasati tassaa di.t.thiyaa pa.tinissaggaaya. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno samanubhaasanaa, tassaa di.t.thiyaa pa.tinissaggaaya, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``samanubha.t.tho ^a^M0.0179^ea^ sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu, tassaa di.t.thiyaa pa.tinissaggaaya. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.
[03]~nattiyaa ^a^T2.0437^ea^ dukka.ta.m. dviihi kammavaacaahi dukka.taa. kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 421^b^.^eb^ dhammakamme dhammakammasa~n~nii na pa.tinissajjati, aapatti paacittiyassa. dhammakamme vematiko na pa.tinissajjati, aapatti paacittiyassa dhammakamme adhammakammasa~n~nii na pa.tinissajjati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]adhammakamme dhammakammasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. adhammakamme vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa.
[03] 422^b^.^eb^ anaapatti asamanubhaasantassa, pa.tinissajjantassa, ummattakassaati.
[06] ari.t.thasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 423^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0438^ea^ ^a^P4.0137^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jaana.m tathaavaadinaa ari.t.thena bhikkhunaa {bhikkhunaa gaddhabaadhipubbena (?)} aka.taanudhammena ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissa.t.thena saddhi.m sambhu~njantipi sa.mvasantipi sahaapi seyya.m kappenti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jaana.m tathaavaadinaa ari.t.thena bhikkhunaa {bhikkhunaa gaddhabaadhipubbena (?)} aka.taanudhammena ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissa.t.thena saddhi.m sambhu~njissantipi sa.mvasissantipi sahaapi seyya.m kappessantiiti...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jaana.m tathaavaadinaa ari.t.thena bhikkhunaa {bhikkhunaa gaddhabaadhipubbena (?)} aka.taanudhammena ^a^V0.0183^ea^ ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissa.t.thena saddhi.m sambhu~njathaapi sa.mvasathaapi sahaapi seyya.m kappethaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, jaana.m tathaavaadinaa ari.t.thena bhikkhunaa {bhikkhunaa gaddhabaadhipubbane (?)} aka.taanudhammena ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissa.t.thena saddhi.m sambhu~njissathaapi sa.mvasissathaapi sahaapi seyya.m kappessatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 424^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo^eb^ ^a^M0.0180^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhu jaana.m tathaavaadinaa bhikkhunaa aka.taanudhammena ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissa.t.thena saddhi.m sambhu~njeyya vaa sa.mvaseyya vaa saha vaa seyya.m^eb^ ^a^T2.0439^ea^ ^b^kappeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 425^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^jaanaati^eb^ naama saama.m vaa jaanaati, a~n~ne vaa tassa aarocenti, so vaa aaroceti.
[03]^b^tathaavaadinaa^eb^ti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti eva.m vaadinaa.
[03]^b^aka.taanudhammo^eb^ naama ukkhitto anosaarito.
[03]^b^ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissa.t.thena saddhi^eb^nti eta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissa.t.thena saddhi.m.

[03]^b^sambhu~njeyya vaa^eb^ti sambhogo naama dve sambhogaa -- aamisasambhogo ca dhammasambhogo ca. ^b^aamisasambhogo^eb^ naama aamisa.m deti vaa pa.tigga.nhaati vaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. ^b^dhammasambhogo^eb^ naama uddisati vaa uddisaapeti vaa, padena uddisati vaa uddisaapeti vaa, pade pade aapatti paacittiyassa. akkharaaya uddisati vaa uddisaapeti vaa, akkharakkharaaya aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^sa.mvaseyya^eb^ ^a^P4.0138^ea^ ^b^vaa^eb^ti ukkhittakena saddhi.m uposatha.m vaa pavaara.na.m vaa sa"nghakamma.m vaa karoti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^saha^eb^ ^a^V0.0184^ea^ ^b^vaa seyya.m kappeyyaa^eb^ti ekacchanne ukkhittake nipanne bhikkhu nipajjati, aapatti paacittiyassa. bhikkhu nipanne ukkhittako nipajjati, aapatti paacittiyassa. ubho vaa nipajjanti, aapatti paacittiyassa. u.t.thahitvaa punappuna.m nipajjanti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 426^b^.^eb^ ukkhittake ^a^T2.0440^ea^ ukkhittakasa~n~nii sambhu~njati vaa sa.mvasati vaa saha vaa seyya.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. ukkhittake vematiko sambhu~njati vaa sa.mvasati vaa saha vaa seyya.m kappeti, aapatti dukka.tassa. ukkhittake anukkhittakasa~n~nii sambhu~njati vaa sa.mvasati vaa saha vaa seyya.m kappeti, anaapatti ^a^M0.0181^ea^. anukkhittake ukkhittakasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. anukkhittake vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. anukkhittake anukkhittakasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 427^b^.^eb^ anaapatti anukkhittoti jaanaati, ukkhitto osaaritoti jaanaati, ukkhitto ta.m di.t.thi.m pa.tinissa.t.thoti jaanaati, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] ukkhittasambhogasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 428^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0441^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena ka.n.takassa {ka.n.dakassa (syaa0 ka0)} naama sama.nuddesassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti. assosu.m kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu ka.n.takassa naama kira sama.nuddesassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu yena ka.n.tako sama.nuddeso tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ka.n.taka.m sama.nuddesa.m etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m kira te, aavuso ka.n.taka, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa ye'me antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti? ``eva.mbyaakho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti.

[03]maa ^a^V0.0185^ea^, aavuso ka.n.taka, eva.m avaca. maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi. na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m. na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. anekapariyaayena, aavuso ka.n.taka, antaraayikaa ^a^T2.0442^ea^ dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa. ala~nca ^a^M0.0182^ea^ pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo...pe0... evampi kho ka.n.tako sama.nuddeso tehi bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano tatheva ta.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa voharati -- ``eva.mbyaakho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti.

[03]yato ca kho te bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu ka.n.taka.m sama.nuddesa.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetu.m, atha kho te bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa ka.n.taka.m sama.nuddesa.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira te, ka.n.taka, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa ^a^T2.0443^ea^ dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti? ``eva.mbyaakho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti.

[03]``kassa nu kho naama tva.m, moghapurisa, mayaa eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaasi? nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa, ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya? appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...pe0... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. atha ca pana tva.m, moghapurisa, attanaa duggahitena amhe ceva abbhaacikkhasi attaana~nca kha.nasi bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavasi. ta~nhi te, moghapurisa, bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... ^a^T2.0444^ea^ pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathattaayaa''ti. vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho ka.n.taka.m sama.nuddesa.m naasetu. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, naasetabbo -- ajjatagge te, aavuso ka.n.taka, na ^a^P4.0139^ea^ ceva so bhagavaa satthaa apadisitabbo. yampi ca~n~ne sama.nuddesaa labhanti bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m dirattatiratta.m sahaseyya.m saapi ^a^M0.0183^ea^ te natthi. cara pire vinassaa''ti. atha kho sa"ngho ka.n.taka.m sama.nuddesa.m naasesi.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0186^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jaana.m tathaanaasita.m ka.n.taka.m sama.nuddesa.m upalaapentipi upa.t.thaapentipi sambhu~njantipi sahaapi seyya.m kappenti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jaana.m tathaanaasita.m ka.n.taka.m sama.nuddesa.m upalaapessantipi upa.t.thaapessantipi sambhu~njissantipi sahaapi seyya.m kappessantii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jaana.m tathaanaasita.m ka.n.taka.m sama.nuddesa.m upalaapethaapi upa.t.thaapethaapi sambhu~njathaapi sahaapi seyya.m kappethaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, jaana.m tathaanaasita.m ka.n.taka.m sama.nuddesa.m upalaapessathaapi upa.t.thaapessathaapi sambhu~njissathaapi sahaapi seyya.m kappessatha ^a^T2.0445^ea^! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 429^b^.^eb^ ^b^``sama.nuddesopi ce eva.m vadeyya -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti, so sama.nuddeso bhikkhuuhi evamassa vacaniiyo -- `maavuso sama.nuddesa, eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. anekapariyaayenaavuso sama.nuddesa, antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa. ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaayaa'ti. eva~nca {eva~nca pana (ka0)} so sama.nuddeso bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano tatheva pagga.nheyya, so sama.nuddeso bhikkhuuhi evamassa vacaniiyo -- `ajjatagge te, aavuso sama.nuddesa, na ceva so bhagavaa satthaa apadisitabbo. yampi ca~n~ne sama.nuddesaa labhanti bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m dirattatiratta.m sahaseyya.m saapi te natthi. cara pire vinassaa'ti. yo pana bhikkhu jaana.m tathaanaasita.m sama.nuddesa.m upalaapeyya vaa upa.t.thaapeyya vaa sambhu~njeyya vaa saha vaa seyya.m kappeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 430^b^.^eb^ ^b^sama.nuddeso^eb^ naama saama.nero vuccati.

[03]^b^eva.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0184^ea^ ^b^vadeyyaa^eb^ti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa^b^ ^eb^yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti.
[03]^b^so^eb^ ^a^P4.0140^ea^ ^b^sama.nuddeso^eb^ti ^a^T2.0446^ea^ yo so eva.mvaadii sama.nuddeso.

[03]^b^bhikkhuuhii^eb^ti ^a^V0.0187^ea^ a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi, ye passanti ye su.nanti tehi vattabbo -- ``maa, aavuso sama.nuddesa, eva.m avaca. maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi. na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m. na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. anekapariyaayenaavuso sama.nuddesa, antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa. ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaayaa''ti. dutiyampi vattabbo... tatiyampi vattabbo...pe0... sace pa.tinissajjati icceta.m kusala.m, no ce pa.tinissajjati so sama.nuddeso bhikkhuuhi evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ajjatagge te, aavuso sama.nuddesa, na ceva so bhagavaa satthaa apadisitabbo. yampi ca~n~ne sama.nuddesaa labhanti bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m dirattatiratta.m sahaseyya.m saapi te natthi. cara pire vinassaa''ti.
[03]^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^jaanaati^eb^ naama saama.m vaa jaanaati, a~n~ne vaa tassa aarocenti, so vaa aaroceti.
[03]^b^tathaanaasita^eb^nti eva.m naasita.m.
[03]^b^sama.nuddeso^eb^ naama saama.nero vuccati.
[03]^b^upalaapeyya vaa^eb^ti tassa patta.m vaa ciivara.m vaa uddesa.m vaa paripuccha.m vaa dassaamiiti upalaapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^upa.t.thaapeyya vaa^eb^ti tassa cu.n.na.m vaa mattika.m vaa dantaka.t.tha.m vaa mukhodaka.m vaa saadiyati, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^sambhu~njeyya vaa^eb^ti ^a^T2.0447^ea^ sambhogo naama dve sambhogaa -- aamisasambhogo ca dhammasambhogo ca. ^b^aamisasambhogo^eb^ naama aamisa.m deti vaa pa.tigga.nhaati vaa, aapatti paacittiyassa. ^b^dhammasambhogo^eb^ naama uddisati vaa uddisaapeti vaa, padena uddisati vaa uddisaapeti vaa, pade pade aapatti ^a^M0.0185^ea^ paacittiyassa. akkharaaya uddisati vaa uddisaapeti vaa, akkharakkharaaya aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]^b^saha^eb^ ^a^V0.0188^ea^ ^b^vaa seyya.m kappeyyaa^eb^ti ekacchanne naasitake sama.nuddese nipanne bhikkhu nipajjati, aapatti paacittiyassa. bhikkhu nipanne naasitako sama.nuddeso nipajjati, aapatti paacittiyassa. ubho vaa nipajjanti, aapatti paacittiyassa. u.t.thahitvaa punappuna.m nipajjanti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 431^b^.^eb^ naasitake naasitakasa~n~nii upalaapeti vaa upa.t.thaapeti vaa sambhu~njati vaa saha vaa seyya.m kappeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. naasitake vematiko upalaapeti vaa upa.t.thaapeti vaa sambhu~njati vaa saha vaa seyya.m kappeti, aapatti dukka.tassa. naasitake anaasitakasa~n~nii upalaapeti vaa upa.t.thaapeti vaa sambhu~njati vaa saha vaa seyya.m kappeti, anaapatti. anaasitake naasitakasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. anaasitake vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. anaasitake anaasitakasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 432^b^.^eb^ anaapatti ^a^T2.0448^ea^ anaasitakoti jaanaati, ta.m di.t.thi.m pa.tinissa.t.thoti jaanaati, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] ka.n.takasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.
[06] sappaa.nakavaggo sattamo.
[06] tassuddaana.m --
[21] sa~nciccavadhasappaa.na.m, ukko.ta.m du.t.thullachaadana.m.

[22] ukkhitta.m ka.n.taka~nceva, dasa sikkhaapadaa imeti..

[03] 433^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0449^ea^ ^a^P4.0141^ea^ ^a^V0.0189^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa channo anaacaara.m ^a^M0.0186^ea^ aacarati. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``maavuso channa, evaruupa.m akaasi. neta.m kappatii''ti. so eva.m vadeti -- ``na taavaaha.m, aavuso, etasmi.m sikkhaapade sikkhissaami yaava na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m byatta.m vinayadhara.m paripucchaamii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa channo bhikkhuuhi sahadhammika.m vuccamaano eva.m vakkhati -- na taavaaha.m, aavuso, etasmi.m sikkhaapade sikkhissaami yaava na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m byatta.m vinayadhara.m paripucchaamii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tva.m, channa, bhikkhuuhi sahadhammika.m vuccamaano eva.m vadesi -- ``na taavaaha.m, aavuso, etasmi.m sikkhaapade sikkhissaami yaava na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m byatta.m vinayadhara.m paripucchaamii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, bhikkhuuhi sahadhammika.m vuccamaano eva.m vakkhasi -- ``na taavaaha.m, aavuso, etasmi.m sikkhaapade sikkhissaami yaava na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m byatta.m vinayadhara.m paripucchaamii''ti. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi sahadhammika.m vuccamaano eva.m vadeyya ^a^T2.0450^ea^ -- `na taavaaha.m, aavuso, etasmi.m sikkhaapade sikkhissaami yaava na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m byatta.m vinayadhara.m paripucchaamii'ti, paacittiya.m. sikkhamaanena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa a~n~naatabba.m paripucchitabba.m paripa~nhitabba.m. aya.m tattha saamiicii''^eb^ti.
[03] 435^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^bhikkhuuhii^eb^ti a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi.

[03]^b^sahadhammika.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0190^ea^ naama ya.m bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m sikkhaapada.m eta.m sahadhammika.m naama. tena vuccamaano eva.m vadeti {vadeyya (ka0)} -- ``na taavaaha.m, aavuso, etasmi.m sikkhaapade sikkhissaami yaava na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m byatta.m vinayadhara.m paripucchaamii''ti {imaani padaani syaa0 potthake na dissanti}. pa.n.dita.m byatta.m {imaani padaani syaa0 potthake na dissanti} medhaavi.m bahussuta.m dhammakathika.m paripucchaamiiti bha.nati, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 436^b^.^eb^ upasampanne ^a^M0.0187^ea^ upasampannasa~n~nii eva.m vadeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. upasampanne vematiko eva.m vadeti, aapatti paacittiyassa. upasampanne anupasampannasa~n~nii ^a^P4.0142^ea^ eva.m vadeti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]apa~n~nattena vuccamaano -- ``ida.m na sallekhaaya na dhutatthaaya na paasaadikataaya na apacayaaya na viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattatii''ti eva.m vadeti, ``na taavaaha.m, aavuso, etasmi.m sikkhaapade sikkhissaami yaava na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m byatta.m vinayadhara.m pa.n.dita.m medhaavi.m bahussuta.m dhammakathika.m paripucchaamii''ti bha.nati, aapatti dukka.tassa.

[03]anupasampannena pa~n~nattena vaa apa~n~nattena vaa vuccamaano ^a^T2.0451^ea^ -- ``ida.m na sallekhaaya na dhutatthaaya na paasaadikataaya na apacayaaya na viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattatii''ti eva.m vadeti, ``na taavaaha.m, aavuso, etasmi.m sikkhaapade sikkhissaami yaava na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m byatta.m vinayadhara.m pa.n.dita.m medhaavi.m bahussuta.m dhammakathika.m paripucchaamii''ti bha.nati, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampanne upasampannasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampanne vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampanne anupasampannasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa.
[03]^b^sikkhamaanenaa^eb^ti sikkhitukaamena.
[03]^b^a~n~naatabba^eb^nti jaanitabba.m.
[03]^b^paripucchitabba^eb^nti ``ida.m, bhante, katha.m; imassa vaa kvattho''ti?
[03]^b^paripa~nhitabba^eb^nti cintetabba.m tulayitabba.m.
[03]^b^aya.m tattha saamiicii^eb^ti aya.m tattha anudhammataa.
[03] 437^b^.^eb^ anaapatti ^a^V0.0191^ea^ ``jaanissaami sikkhissaamii''ti bha.nati, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] sahadhammikasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0452^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. {ida.m vatthu cuu.lava0 320} tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m anekapariyaayena vinayakatha.m katheti, vinayassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, vinayapariyattiyaa ^a^M0.0188^ea^ va.n.na.m bhaasati, aadissa aadissa aayasmato upaalissa va.n.na.m bhaasati. bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi {bhikkhuu bhagavaa (syaa0 ka0)} -- ``bhagavaa kho anekapariyaayena vinayakatha.m katheti, vinayassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, vinayapariyattiyaa va.n.na.m bhaasati, aadissa aadissa aayasmato upaalissa va.n.na.m bhaasati. handa maya.m, aavuso, aayasmato upaalissa santike vinaya.m pariyaapu.naamaa''ti, te ca bahuu bhikkhuu theraa ca navaa ca majjhimaa ca aayasmato upaalissa santike vinaya.m pariyaapu.nanti.

[03]atha kho chabbaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi ^a^P4.0143^ea^ -- ``etarahi kho, aavuso, bahuu bhikkhuu theraa ca navaa ca majjhimaa ca aayasmato upaalissa santike vinaya.m pariyaapu.nanti. sace ime vinaye pakata~n~nuno bhavissanti amhe yenicchaka.m yadicchaka.m yaavadicchaka.m aaka.d.dhissanti parika.d.dhissanti. handa maya.m, aavuso, vinaya.m viva.n.nemaa''ti. atha kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- ``ki.m panimehi khuddaanukhuddakehi sikkhaapadehi uddi.t.thehi, yaavadeva kukkuccaaya vihesaaya vilekhaaya sa.mvattantii''ti! ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- katha~nhi ^a^T2.0453^ea^ naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu vinaya.m viva.n.nessantiiti...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, vinaya.m viva.n.nethaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, vinaya.m viva.n.nessatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 439^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu paatimokkhe uddissamaane eva.m vadeyya -- `ki.m panimehi khuddaanukhuddakehi ^a^V0.0192^ea^ sikkhaapadehi uddi.t.thehi, yaavadeva kukkuccaaya vihesaaya vilekhaaya sa.mvattantii'ti, sikkhaapadaviva.n.nake paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 440^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^paatimokkhe uddissamaane^eb^ti uddisante vaa uddisaapente vaa sajjhaaya.m vaa karonte.

[03]^b^eva.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0189^ea^ ^b^vadeyyaa^eb^ti -- ``ki.m panimehi khuddaanukhuddakehi sikkhaapadehi uddi.t.thehi, yaavadeva kukkuccaaya vihesaaya vilekhaaya sa.mvattantiiti. ``ye ima.m pariyaapu.nanti tesa.m kukkucca.m hoti, vihesaa hoti, vilekhaa hoti, ye ima.m na pariyaapu.nanti tesa.m kukkucca.m na hoti vihesaa na hoti vilekhaa na hoti. anuddi.t.tha.m ida.m vara.m, anuggahita.m ida.m vara.m, apariyaapu.ta.m ida.m vara.m, adhaarita.m ida.m vara.m, vinayo vaa antaradhaayatu, ime vaa bhikkhuu apakata~n~nuno hontuu''ti upasampannassa vinaya.m viva.n.neti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 441^b^.^eb^ upasampanne upasampannasa~n~nii vinaya.m viva.n.neti, aapatti paacittiyassa ^a^T2.0454^ea^. upasampanne vematiko vinaya.m viva.n.neti, aapatti paacittiyassa. upasampanne anupasampannasa~n~nii vinaya.m viva.n.neti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]a~n~na.m dhamma.m viva.n.neti, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampannassa vinaya.m vaa a~n~na.m vaa dhamma.m viva.n.neti, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampanne upasampannasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampanne ^a^P4.0144^ea^ vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampanne anupasampannasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa.

[03] 442^b^.^eb^ anaapatti na viva.n.netukaamo, ``i"ngha tva.m suttante vaa gaathaayo vaa abhidhamma.m vaa pariyaapu.nassu, pacchaa vinaya.m pariyaapu.nissasii''ti bha.nati, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.

[03] 443^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0455^ea^ ^a^V0.0193^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu anaacaara.m aacaritvaa ``a~n~naa.nakena aapannaati jaanantuu''ti paatimokkhe uddissamaane eva.m vadanti -- ``idaaneva kho maya.m jaanaama, ayampi kira dhammo suttaagato suttapariyaapanno anvaddhamaasa.m uddesa.m aagacchatii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu paatimokkhe uddissamaane eva.m vakkhanti -- idaaneva kho maya.m jaanaama ^a^M0.0190^ea^, ayampi kira dhammo suttaagato suttapariyaapanno anvaddhamaasa.m uddesa.m aagacchatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, paatimokkhe uddissamaane eva.m vadetha -- ``idaaneva kho maya.m jaanaama, ayampi kira dhammo suttaagato suttapariyaapanno anvaddhamaasa.m uddesa.m aagacchatii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, paatimokkhe uddissamaane eva.m vakkhatha -- ``idaaneva kho maya.m jaanaama, ayampi kira dhammo suttaagato suttapariyaapanno anvaddhamaasa.m uddesa.m aagacchatii''ti! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 444^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu anvaddhamaasa.m^eb^ ^a^T2.0456^ea^ ^b^paatimokkhe uddissamaane eva.m vadeyya -- `idaaneva kho aha.m jaanaami, ayampi kira dhammo suttaagato suttapariyaapanno anvaddhamaasa.m uddesa.m aagacchatii'ti. ta~nce bhikkhu.m a~n~ne bhikkhuu jaaneyyu.m nisinnapubba.m iminaa bhikkhunaa dvattikkhattu.m paatimokkhe uddissamaane, ko pana vaado bhiyyo {bhiyyoti (syaa0)}, na ca tassa bhikkhuno a~n~naa.nakena mutti atthi, ya~nca tattha aapatti.m aapanno ta~nca yathaadhammo kaaretabbo, uttari cassa moho aaropetabbo -- `tassa te, aavuso, alaabhaa, tassa te dulladdha.m, ya.m tva.m paatimokkhe uddissamaane na saadhuka.m a.t.thi.m katvaa {a.t.thikatvaa (syaa0 ka0)} manasi karosii'ti. ida.m tasmi.m mohanake paacittiya''^eb^nti.

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0470^ea^ ^a^M0.0199^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu anaacaara.m aacaritvaa ekamekassa kamme kayiramaane pa.tikkosanti. tena kho pana samayena sa"ngho sannipatito hoti kenacideva kara.niiyena. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ciivarakamma.m karontaa ekassa chanda.m ada.msu. atha kho sa"ngho -- ``aya.m, aavuso, chabbaggiyo bhikkhu ekako aagato, handassa maya.m kamma.m karomaa''ti tassa kamma.m akaasi. atha kho so bhikkhu yena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``ki.m, aavuso, sa"ngho akaasii''ti? ``sa"ngho me, aavuso, kamma.m akaasii''ti. ``na maya.m, aavuso, etadatthaaya chanda.m adamhaa -- ``tuyha.m kamma.m karissatii''ti. sace ca maya.m jaaneyyaama ``tuyha.m kamma.m karissatii''ti, na maya.m chanda.m dadeyyaamaa''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu dhammikaana.m kammaana.m chanda.m datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m {khiyyadhamma.m (itipi)} aapajjissantii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dhammikaana.m kammaana.m ^a^P4.0152^ea^ chanda.m datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m {khiyyadhamma.m (itipi)} aapajjathaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, dhammikaana.m kammaana.m chanda.m datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m ^a^T2.0471^ea^ {khiyyadhamma.m (itipi)} aapajjissatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 475^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu dhammikaana.m kammaana.m chanda.m datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajjeyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 476^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^V0.0203^ea^ ^b^panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.

[03]^b^dhammika.m^eb^ naama ^b^kamma.m^eb^ apalokanakamma.m ~nattikamma.m ~nattidutiyakamma.m ~natticatutthakamma.m dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena kata.m, eta.m dhammika.m naama kamma.m. chanda.m datvaa khiyyati aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 477^b^.^eb^ dhammakamme ^a^M0.0200^ea^ dhammakammasa~n~nii chanda.m datvaa khiyyati, aapatti paacittiyassa. dhammakamme vematiko chanda.m datvaa khiyyati, aapatti dukka.tassa. dhammakamme adhammakammasa~n~nii chanda.m datvaa khiyyati, anaapatti. adhammakamme dhammakammasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. adhammakamme vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 478^b^.^eb^ anaapatti -- ``adhammena vaa vaggena vaa na kammaarahassa vaa kamma.m kata''nti jaananto khiyyati, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] kammapa.tibaahanasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0472^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena sa"ngho sannipatito hoti kenacideva kara.niiyena. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ciivarakamma.m karontaa ekassa chanda.m ada.msu. atha kho sa"ngho ``yassatthaaya sannipatito ta.m kamma.m karissaamii''ti ~natti.m .thapesi. atha kho so bhikkhu -- ``evamevime ekamekassa kamma.m karonti, kassa tumhe kamma.m karissathaa''ti chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu sa"nghe vinicchayakathaaya vattamaanaaya ^a^P4.0153^ea^ chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamissatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, sa"nghe vinicchayakathaaya vattamaanaaya chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamasiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, sa"nghe vinicchayakathaaya vattamaanaaya chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamissasi ^a^V0.0204^ea^! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 480^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu sa"nghe vinicchayakathaaya vattamaanaaya chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkameyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 481^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^T2.0473^ea^ ^a^M0.0201^ea^ ^b^panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^sa"nghe vinicchayakathaa^eb^ naama vatthu vaa aarocita.m hoti avinicchita.m, ~natti vaa .thapitaa hoti, kammavaacaa vaa vippakataa hoti.

[03]^b^chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkameyyaa^eb^ti -- ``katha.m ida.m kamma.m kuppa.m assa vagga.m assa na kareyyaa''ti gacchati, aapatti dukka.tassa. parisaaya hatthapaasa.m vijahantassa aapatti dukka.tassa. vijahite aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 482^b^.^eb^ dhammakamme dhammakammasa~n~nii chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamati, aapatti paacittiyassa. dhammakamme vematiko chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamati, aapatti dukka.tassa. dhammakamme adhammakammasa~n~nii chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamati, anaapatti. adhammakamme dhammakammasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. adhammakamme vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 483^b^.^eb^ anaapatti -- ``sa"nghassa bha.n.dana.m vaa kalaho vaa viggaho vaa vivaado vaa bhavissatii''ti gacchati, ``sa"nghabhedo vaa sa"ngharaaji vaa bhavissatii''ti gacchati, ``adhammena vaa vaggena vaa na kammaarahassa vaa kamma.m karissatii''ti gacchati, gilaano gacchati, gilaanassa kara.niiyena gacchati, uccaarena vaa passaavena vaa pii.lito gacchati, ``na kamma.m ^a^T2.0474^ea^ kopetukaamo puna paccaagamissaamii''ti gacchati, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] chanda.m adatvaa gamanasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0475^ea^ ^a^P4.0154^ea^ ^a^V0.0205^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~napeti bhattaani ca uddisati. so caayasmaa dubbalaciivaro hoti. tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa eka.m ciivara.m uppanna.m hoti. atha kho sa"ngho ta.m ciivara.m aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa adaasi ^a^M0.0202^ea^. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``yathaasanthuta.m bhikkhuu sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.naamentii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu samaggena sa"nghena ciivara.m datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajjissantii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, samaggena sa"nghena ciivara.m datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajjathaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, samaggena sa"nghena ciivara.m datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajjissatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m, vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 485^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu samaggena sa"nghena ciivara.m datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajjeyya `yathaasanthuta.m bhikkhuu sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.naamentii'ti, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 486^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^T2.0476^ea^ ^b^panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^samaggo^eb^ naama sa"ngho samaanasa.mvaasako samaanasiimaaya.m .thito.
[03]^b^ciivara.m^eb^ naama channa.m ciivaraana.m a~n~natara.m ciivara.m vikappanupaga.m pacchima.m.
[03]^b^datvaa^eb^ti saya.m datvaa.
[03]^b^yathaasanthuta.m^eb^ naama yathaamittataa yathaasandi.t.thataa yathaasambhattataa yathaasamaanupajjhaayakataa yathaasamaanaacariyakataa.
[03]^b^sa"nghika.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0206^ea^ naama sa"nghassa dinna.m hoti pariccatta.m.
[03]^b^laabho^eb^ naama ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa, antamaso cu.n.napi.n.dopi, dantaka.t.thampi, dasikasuttampi.

[03]^b^pacchaa^eb^ ^a^P4.0155^ea^ ^b^khiiyanadhamma.m aapajjeyyaa^eb^ti upasampannassa sa"nghena sammatassa senaasanapa~n~naapakassa vaa bhattuddesakassa vaa yaagubhaajakassa vaa phalabhaajakassa vaa khajjabhaajakassa vaa appamattakavissajjakassa vaa ciivara.m dinne khiyyati, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 487^b^.^eb^ dhammakamme dhammakammasa~n~nii ciivara.m dinne khiyyati, aapatti paacittiyassa. dhammakamme vematiko ciivara.m dinne khiyyati, aapatti paacittiyassa. dhammakamme adhammakammasa~n~nii ciivara.m dinne khiyyati, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03]a~n~na.m ^a^M0.0203^ea^ parikkhaara.m dinne khiyyati, aapatti dukka.tassa. upasampannassa sa"nghena asammatassa senaasanapa~n~naapakassa vaa bhattuddesakassa vaa yaagubhaajakassa vaa phalabhaajakassa vaa khajjabhaajakassa vaa appamattakavissajjakassa vaa ciivara.m vaa a~n~na.m vaa parikkhaara.m dinne khiyyati, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampannassa sa"nghena ^a^T2.0477^ea^ sammatassa vaa asammatassa vaa senaasanapa~n~naapakassa vaa bhattuddesakassa vaa yaagubhaajakassa vaa phalabhaajakassa vaa khajjabhaajakassa vaa appamattakavissajjakassa vaa ciivara.m vaa a~n~na.m vaa parikkhaara.m dinne khiyyati, aapatti dukka.tassa. adhammakamme dhammakammasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. adhammakamme vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 488^b^.^eb^ anaapatti -- pakatiyaa chandaa dosaa mohaa bhayaa karonta.m ``kvattho tassa dinnena laddhaapi vinipaatessati na sammaa upanessatii''ti khiyyati, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] dubbalasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m ekaadasama.m.

[03] 489^b^.^eb^ {ida.m vatthu paaraa0 657} tena ^a^T2.0478^ea^ ^a^V0.0207^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena saavatthiya.m a~n~natarassa puugassa sa"nghassa saciivarabhatta.m pa.tiyatta.m hoti -- ``bhojetvaa ciivarena acchaadessaamaa''ti. atha kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu yena so puugo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m puuga.m etadavocu.m -- ``dethaavuso, imaani ciivaraani imesa.m bhikkhuuna''nti. ``na maya.m, bhante, dassaama. amhaaka.m sa"nghassa anuvassa.m saciivarabhikkhaa pa~n~nattaa''ti. ``bahuu, aavuso, sa"nghassa daayakaa, bahuu sa"nghassa bhattaa {bhaddaa (ka0)}. ime tumhe nissaaya tumhe sampassantaa idha viharanti. tumhe ce imesa.m na dassatha, atha ko ^a^P4.0156^ea^ carahi imesa.m dassati? dethaavuso, imaani ciivaraani imesa.m bhikkhuuna''nti. atha kho so puugo chabbaggiyehi bhikkhuuhi nippii.liyamaano yathaapa.tiyatta.m ciivara.m chabbaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m datvaa sa"ngha.m bhattena parivisi. ye te bhikkhuu jaananti ^a^M0.0204^ea^ sa"nghassa saciivarabhatta.m pa.tiyatta.m ``na ca jaananti chabbaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m dinna''nti te evamaaha.msu -- ``o.nojethaavuso, sa"nghassa ciivara''nti. ``natthi, bhante. yathaapa.tiyatta.m ciivara.m ayyaa chabbaggiyaa ayyaana.m chabbaggiyaana.m pari.naamesu''nti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jaana.m sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.nata.m puggalassa pari.naamessantii''ti...pe0... ^a^T2.0479^ea^ sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jaana.m sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.nata.m puggalassa pari.naamethaati? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, jaana.m sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.nata.m puggalassa pari.naamessatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 490^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu jaana.m sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.nata.m puggalassa pari.naameyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 491^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^jaanaati^eb^ naama saama.m vaa jaanaati, a~n~ne vaa tassa aarocenti, so vaa aaroceti.
[03]^b^sa"nghika.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0208^ea^ naama sa"nghassa dinna.m hoti pariccatta.m.
[03]^b^laabho^eb^ naama ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa, antamaso cu.n.napi.n.dopi, dantaka.t.thampi, dasikasuttampi.
[03]^b^pari.nata.m^eb^ naama ``dassaama karissaamaa''ti vaacaa bhinnaa hoti, ta.m puggalassa pari.naameti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 492^b^.^eb^ pari.nate pari.natasa~n~nii puggalassa pari.naameti, aapatti paacittiyassa. pari.nate vematiko puggalassa pari.naameti, aapatti dukka.tassa. pari.nate apari.natasa~n~nii puggalassa pari.naameti, anaapatti. sa"nghassa pari.nata.m a~n~nasa"nghassa vaa cetiyassa vaa pari.naameti, aapatti dukka.tassa. cetiyassa pari.nata.m a~n~nacetiyassa ^a^T2.0480^ea^ vaa sa"nghassa vaa puggalassa vaa pari.naameti, aapatti dukka.tassa. puggalassa pari.nata.m a~n~napuggalassa vaa sa"nghassa vaa cetiyassa vaa pari.naameti, aapatti dukka.tassa ^a^M0.0205^ea^. apari.nate pari.natasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. apari.nate vematiko ^a^P4.0157^ea^, aapatti dukka.tassa. apari.nate apari.natasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 493^b^.^eb^ anaapatti -- ``kattha demaa''ti pucchiiyamaano -- ``yattha tumhaaka.m deyyadhammo paribhoga.m vaa labheyya pa.tisa"nkhaara.m vaa labheyya cira.t.thitiko vaa assa yattha vaa pana tumhaaka.m citta.m pasiidati tattha dethaa''ti bha.nati, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] pari.naamanasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m dvaadasama.m.
[06] sahadhammikavaggo a.t.thamo.
[06] tassuddaana.m --
[21] sahadhamma-viva.n.na~nca, mohaapana.m pahaaraka.m.
[27] talasatti amuula~nca, sa~ncicca ca upassuti.
[22] pa.tibaahanachanda~nca, dabba~nca pari.naamananti..

[03] 494^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0481^ea^ ^a^V0.0209^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena raajaa pasenadi kosalo uyyaanapaala.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bha.ne, uyyaana.m sodhehi. uyyaana.m gamissaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho so uyyaanapaalo ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa pa.tissutvaa uyyaana.m sodhento addasa bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m. disvaana yena raajaa pasenadi kosalo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m etadavoca -- ``suddha.m, deva, uyyaana.m. apica, bhagavaa tattha nisinno''ti. ``hotu, bha.ne! maya.m bhagavanta.m payirupaasissaamaa''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo uyyaana.m gantvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro upaasako bhagavanta.m payirupaasanto nisinno hoti. addasaa kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo ta.m upaasaka.m bhagavanta.m payirupaasanta.m nisinna.m. disvaana bhiito a.t.thaasi. atha kho ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa etadahosi -- ``naarahataaya.m puriso paapo hotu.m ^a^M0.0206^ea^, yathaa bhagavanta.m payirupaasatii''ti. yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. atha kho so upaasako bhagavato gaaravena raajaana.m ^a^P4.0158^ea^ pasenadi.m kosala.m neva abhivaadesi na paccu.t.thaasi. atha kho raajaa pasenadi ^a^T2.0482^ea^ kosalo anattamano ahosi -- ``katha~nhi naamaaya.m puriso mayi aagate neva abhivaadessati na paccu.t.thessatii''ti! atha kho bhagavaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m anattamana.m viditvaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m etadavoca -- ``eso kho, mahaaraaja, upaasako bahussuto aagataagamo kaamesu viitaraago''ti. atha kho ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa etadahosi -- ``naarahataaya.m upaasako orako hotu.m, bhagavaapi imassa va.n.na.m bhaasatii''ti. ta.m upaasaka.m etadavoca -- ``vadeyyaasi, upaasaka, yena attho''ti. ``su.t.thu, devaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 495^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0210^ea^ kho pana samayena raajaa pasenadi kosalo uparipaasaadavaragato hoti. addasaa kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo ta.m upaasaka.m rathikaaya {rathiyaaya (itipi)} chattapaa.ni.m gacchanta.m. disvaana pakkosaapetvaa etadavoca -- ``tva.m kira, upaasaka, bahussuto aagataagamo. saadhu, upaasaka, amhaaka.m itthaagaara.m dhamma.m vaacehii''ti. ``yamaha.m {yampaaha.m (sii0)}, deva, jaanaami ayyaana.m vaahasaa, ayyaava devassa itthaagaara.m dhamma.m vaacessantii''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo -- ``sacca.m kho upaasako aahaa''ti yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^T2.0483^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa eka.m bhikkhu.m aa.naapetu yo amhaaka.m itthaagaara.m dhamma.m vaacessatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi...pe0... padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``tenahaananda, ra~n~no itthaagaara.m dhamma.m vaacehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato ^a^M0.0207^ea^ pa.tissutvaa kaalena kaala.m pavisitvaa ra~n~no itthaagaara.m dhamma.m vaaceti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami.

[03] 496^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena raajaa pasenadi kosalo mallikaaya deviyaa saddhi.m sayanagato hoti. addasaa kho mallikaa devii aayasmanta.m aananda.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana sahasaa vu.t.thaasi; piitakama.t.tha.m ^a^P4.0159^ea^ dussa.m pabhassittha. atha kho aayasmaa aanando tatova pa.tinivattitvaa aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa aanando pubbe appa.tisa.mvidito ra~n~no antepura.m pavisissatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m ^a^T2.0484^ea^ kira tva.m, aananda, pubbe appa.tisa.mvidito ra~n~no antepura.m pavisasiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, aananda, pubbe appa.tisa.mvidito ra~n~no antepura.m pavisissasi! neta.m, aananda, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 10.45} ``dasayime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa raajantepurappavesane. katame dasa? idha, bhikkhave, raajaa mahesiyaa saddhi.m nisinno hoti, tattha bhikkhu pavisati. mahesii vaa bhikkhu.m disvaa sita.m paatukaroti. bhikkhu vaa mahesi.m disvaa sita.m paatukaroti. tattha ra~n~no eva.m hoti -- ``addhaa imesa.m kata.m vaa karissanti vaa''ti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03]``puna ^a^V0.0211^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, raajaa bahukicco bahukara.niiyo. a~n~natara.m itthi.m gantvaa nassarati. saa tena gabbha.m ga.nhi. tattha ra~n~no eva.m hoti -- ``na kho idha a~n~no koci pavisati a~n~natra pabbajitena. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma''nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no antepure a~n~natara.m ratana.m nassati. tattha ra~n~no eva.m hoti -- ``na kho idha a~n~no koci pavisati a~n~natra pabbajitena. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma''nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03]``puna ^a^T2.0485^ea^ ^a^M0.0208^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no antepure abbhantaraa guyhamantaa bahiddhaa sambheda.m gacchanti. tattha ra~n~no eva.m hoti -- ``na kho idha a~n~no koci pavisati a~n~natra pabbajitena. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma''nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no antepure putto vaa pitara.m pattheti pitaa vaa putta.m pattheti. tesa.m eva.m hoti -- ``na kho idha a~n~no koci pavisati a~n~natra pabbajitena. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma''nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, raajaa niica.t.thaaniya.m ucce .thaane .thapeti. yesa.m ta.m amanaapa.m tesa.m eva.m hoti -- ``raajaa kho pabbajitena sa.msa.t.tho. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma''nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, cha.t.tho aadiinavo, raajantepurappavesane.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, raajaa ucca.t.thaaniya.m niice .thaane .thapeti. yesa.m ta.m amanaapa.m tesa.m eva.m hoti -- ``raajaa kho pabbajitena sa.msa.t.tho. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma''nti. aya.m ^a^P4.0160^ea^, bhikkhave, sattamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, raajaa akaale sena.m uyyojeti. yesa.m ta.m amanaapa.m tesa.m eva.m hoti -- ``raajaa kho pabbajitena sa.msa.t.tho. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma''nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, a.t.thamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03]``puna ^a^T2.0486^ea^ ^a^V0.0212^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, raajaa kaale sena.m uyyojetvaa antaraamaggato nivattaapeti. yesa.m ta.m amanaapa.m tesa.m eva.m hoti -- ```raajaa kho pabbajitena sa.msa.t.tho. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma''nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, navamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no raajantepura.m hatthisammadda.m assasammadda.m rathasammadda.m rajjaniiyaani {rajjaniiyaani (ka0)} ruupasaddagandharasapho.t.thabbaani, yaani na pabbajitassa saaruppaani. aya.m, bhikkhave, dasamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane. ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa aadiinavaa raajantepurappavesane''ti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m ^a^M0.0209^ea^ anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa dubbharataaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 498^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa {muddhaabhisittassa (syaa0)} anikkhantaraajake aniggataratanake pubbe appa.tisa.mvidito indakhiila.m atikkaameyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 499^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^khattiyo^eb^ naama ubhato sujaato hoti, maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupaku.t.tho jaativaadena.
[03]^b^muddhaavasitto^eb^ naama ^a^T2.0487^ea^ khattiyaabhisekena abhisitto hoti.
[03]^b^anikkhantaraajake^eb^ti raajaa sayanigharaa anikkhanto hoti.
[03]^b^aniggataratanake^eb^ti mahesii sayanigharaa anikkhantaa hoti, ubho vaa anikkhantaa honti.
[03]^b^pubbe appa.tisa.mvidito^eb^ti pubbe anaamantetvaa.
[03]^b^indakhiilo^eb^ naama sayanigharassa ummaaro vuccati.
[03]^b^sayanighara.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0213^ea^ naama yattha katthaci ra~n~no sayana.m pa~n~natta.m hoti, antamaso saa.nipaakaaraparikkhittampi.
[03]^b^indakhiila.m atikkaameyyaa^eb^ti pa.thama.m paada.m ummaara.m atikkaameti, aapatti dukka.tassa. dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[03] 500^b^.^eb^ appa.tisa.mvidite appa.tisa.mviditasa~n~nii indakhiila.m atikkaameti, aapatti paacittiyassa. appa.tisa.mvidite vematiko indakhiila.m atikkaameti, aapatti paacittiyassa. appa.tisa.mvidite pa.tisa.mviditasa~n~nii indakhiila.m atikkaameti, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]pa.tisa.mvidite appa.tisa.mviditasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. pa.tisa.mvidite vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. pa.tisa.mvidite pa.tisa.mviditasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 501^b^.^eb^ anaapatti ^a^P4.0161^ea^ ^a^M0.0210^ea^ pa.tisa.mvidite, na khattiyo hoti, na khattiyaabhisekena abhisitto hoti, raajaa sayanigharaa nikkhanto hoti, mahesii sayanigharaa nikkhantaa hoti, ubho vaa nikkhantaa honti, na sayanighare, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] antepurasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 502^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0488^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu aciravatiyaa nadiyaa nahaayati. a~n~nataropi braahma.no pa~ncasataana.m thavika.m thale nikkhipitvaa aciravatiyaa nadiyaa nahaayanto vissaritvaa agamaasi. atha kho so bhikkhu -- ``tassaaya.m braahma.nassa thavikaa, maa idha nassii''ti aggahesi. atha kho so braahma.no saritvaa turito aadhaavitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``api me, bho, thavika.m passeyyaasii''ti? ``handa, braahma.naa''ti adaasi. atha kho tassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``kena nu kho aha.m upaayena imassa bhikkhuno pu.n.napatta.m na dadeyya''nti! ``na me, bho, pa~ncasataani, sahassa.m me''ti palibundhetvaa mu~nci. atha kho so bhikkhu aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ^a^V0.0214^ea^ ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu ratana.m uggahessatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, ratana.m uggahesiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, ratana.m uggahessasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m ^a^T2.0489^ea^ sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu ratana.m vaa ratanasammata.m vaa ugga.nheyya vaa ugga.nhaapeyya vaa, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 503^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena saavatthiyaa ussavo hoti. manussaa ala"nkatappa.tiyattaa uyyaana.m gacchanti. visaakhaapi migaaramaataa ala"nkatappa.tiyattaa ^a^M0.0211^ea^ ``uyyaana.m gamissaamii''ti gaamato ^a^P4.0162^ea^ nikkhamitvaa -- ``kyaaha.m karissaami uyyaana.m gantvaa, ya.mnuunaaha.m bhagavanta.m payirupaaseyya''nti aabhara.na.m omu~ncitvaa uttaraasa"ngena bha.n.dika.m bandhitvaa daasiyaa adaasi -- ``handa, je, ima.m bha.n.dika.m ga.nhaahii''ti. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho saa daasii ta.m bha.n.dika.m vissaritvaa agamaasi. bhikkhuu passitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``tena hi, bhikkhave, uggahetvaa nikkhipathaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ratana.m vaa ratanasammata.m vaa ajjhaaraame uggahetvaa vaa uggahaapetvaa vaa nikkhipitu.m -- ``yassa bhavissati ^a^T2.0490^ea^ so harissatii''ti. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo pana bhikkhu ratana.m vaa ratanasammata.m vaa, a~n~natra ajjhaaraamaa, ugga.nheyya vaa ugga.nhaapeyya vaa, paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 504^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0215^ea^ kho pana samayena kaasiisu janapade anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa kammantagaamo hoti. tena ca gahapatinaa antevaasii aa.natto hoti -- ``sace bhadantaa aagacchanti bhatta.m kareyyaasii''ti. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu kaasiisu janapade caarika.m caramaanaa yena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa kammantagaamo tenupasa"nkami.msu. addasaa kho so puriso te bhikkhuu duuratova aagacchante. disvaana yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa etadavoca -- ``adhivaasentu, bhante, ayyaa svaatanaaya gahapatino bhatta''nti. adhivaasesu.m kho te bhikkhuu tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho so puriso tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa kaala.m aarocaapetvaa a"ngulimuddika.m omu~ncitvaa te bhikkhuu bhattena parivisitvaa -- ``ayyaa bhu~njitvaa gacchantu, ahampi kammanta.m gamissaamii''ti a"ngulimuddika.m ^a^M0.0212^ea^ vissaritvaa agamaasi. bhikkhuu passitvaa ^a^P4.0163^ea^ -- ``sace maya.m gamissaama nassissataaya.m a"ngulimuddikaa''ti tattheva acchi.msu. atha kho so puriso kammantaa aagacchanto te bhikkhuu passitvaa etadavoca -- ``kissa, bhante, ayyaa idheva ^a^T2.0491^ea^ acchantii''ti? atha kho te bhikkhuu tassa purisassa etamattha.m aarocetvaa saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ratana.m vaa ratanasammata.m vaa ajjhaaraame vaa ajjhaavasathe vaa uggahetvaa vaa uggahaapetvaa vaa nikkhipitu.m -- yassa bhavissati so harissatii''ti. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 505^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu ratana.m vaa ratanasammata.m vaa, a~n~natra ajjhaaraamaa vaa ajjhaavasathaa vaa, ugga.nheyya vaa ugga.nhaapeyya vaa, paacittiya.m. ratana.m vaa pana bhikkhunaa ratanasammata.m vaa ajjhaaraame vaa ajjhaavasathe vaa uggahetvaa vaa uggahaapetvaa vaa nikkhipitabba.m -- `yassa bhavissati so harissatii'ti. aya.m tattha saamiicii''^eb^ti.
[03] 506^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^ratana.m^eb^ naama muttaa ma.ni ve.luriyo sa"nkho silaa pavaala.m rajata.m jaataruupa.m lohita"nko {lohitako (?)} masaaragalla.m.
[03]^b^ratanasammata.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0216^ea^ naama ya.m manussaana.m upabhogaparibhoga.m, eta.m ratanasammata.m naama.
[03]^b^a~n~natra ajjhaaraamaa vaa ajjhaavasathaa vaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa ajjhaaraama.m ajjhaavasatha.m.
[03]^b^ajjhaaraamo^eb^ naama parikkhittassa aaraamassa anto aaraamo, aparikkhittassa upacaaro.
[03]^b^ajjhaavasatho^eb^ naama parikkhittassa aavasathassa anto ^a^T2.0492^ea^ aavasatho, aparikkhittassa upacaaro.
[03]^b^ugga.nheyyaa^eb^ti ^a^M0.0213^ea^ saya.m ga.nhaati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
[03]^b^ugga.nhaapeyyaa^eb^ti a~n~na.m gaahaapeti, aapatti paacittiyassa.

[01] ^b^ratana.m vaa pana bhikkhunaa ratanasammata.m vaa ajjhaaraame vaa ajjhaavasathe vaa uggahetvaa vaa uggahaapetvaa vaa nikkhipitabba^eb^nti ruupena vaa nimittena vaa sa~n~naa.na.m katvaa nikkhipitvaa aacikkhitabba.m -- ``yassa bha.n.da.m na.t.tha.m so aagacchatuu''ti. sace tattha aagacchati so vattabbo -- ``aavuso, kiidisa.m te bha.n.da''nti? sace ruupena vaa nimittena vaa sampaadeti daatabba.m, no ce sampaadeti ``vicinaahi aavuso''ti vattabbo. tamhaa aavaasaa pakkamantena ye tattha honti bhikkhuu patiruupaa, tesa.m hatthe nikkhipitvaa ^a^P4.0164^ea^ pakkamitabba.m. no ce honti bhikkhuu patiruupaa, ye tattha honti gahapatikaa patiruupaa, tesa.m hatthe nikkhipitvaa pakkamitabba.m.
[03]^b^aya.m tattha saamiicii^eb^ti aya.m tattha anudhammataa.

[03] 507^b^.^eb^ anaapatti ratana.m vaa ratanasammata.m vaa ajjhaaraame vaa ajjhaavasathe vaa uggahetvaa vaa uggahaapetvaa vaa nikkhipati -- ``yassa ^b^bhavissati so harissatii''ti, ratanasammata.m vissaasa.m ga.nhaati,^eb^ taavakaalika.m ga.nhaati, pa.msukuulasa~n~nissa, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] ratanasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 508^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0493^ea^ ^a^V0.0217^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu vikaale gaama.m pavisitvaa sabhaaya.m nisiiditvaa anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathenti, seyyathida.m -- {imaa tiracchaanakathaayo dii0 1.17; ma0 ni0 2.223; sa.m0 ni0 5.1080; a0 ni0 10.69} raajakatha.m corakatha.m mahaamattakatha.m senaakatha.m bhayakatha.m yuddhakatha.m annakatha.m paanakatha.m vatthakatha.m sayanakatha.m maalaakatha.m gandhakatha.m ~naatikatha.m yaanakatha.m gaamakatha.m nigamakatha.m nagarakatha.m janapadakatha.m itthikatha.m {itthikatha.m purisakatha.m (ka0) majjhimapa.n.naasa.t.thakathaa 156 pi.t.the oloketabbaa} suurakatha.m visikhaakatha.m kumbha.t.thaanakatha.m pubbapetakatha.m naanattakatha.m ^a^M0.0214^ea^ lokakkhaayika.m samuddakkhaayika.m itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa vikaale gaama.m pavisitvaa sabhaaya.m nisiiditvaa anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathessanti, seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m...pe0... itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa, seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti!

[03] 509^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu kosalesu janapade saavatthi.m gacchantaa saaya.m a~n~natara.m gaama.m upagacchi.msu. manussaa te bhikkhuu passitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``pavisatha, bhante''ti ^a^V0.0218^ea^. atha kho te bhikkhuu -- ``bhagavataa pa.tikkhitta.m vikaale gaama.m pavisitu''nti kukkuccaayantaa na pavisi.msu. coraa te bhikkhuu acchindi.msu. atha kho te bhikkhuu saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aapucchaa ^a^T2.0495^ea^ vikaale gaama.m pavisitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 510^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu janapade saavatthi.m gacchanto saaya.m a~n~natara.m gaama.m upagacchi. manussaa ta.m bhikkhu.m passitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``pavisatha, bhante''ti. atha kho so bhikkhu -- ``bhagavataa pa.tikkhitta.m anaapucchaa vikaale gaama.m pavisitu''nti kukkuccaayanto na paavisi. coraa ta.m bhikkhu.m acchindi.msu. atha kho so bhikkhu saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, santa.m bhikkhu.m aapucchaa vikaale gaama.m pavisitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
