[03] 560^b^.^eb^ upasampannaaya upasampannasa~n~nii vosaasantiyaa na nivaareti, aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa ^a^V0.0235^ea^. upasampannaaya vematiko vosaasantiyaa na nivaareti, aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa. upasampannaaya anupasampannasa~n~nii vosaasantiyaa na nivaareti, aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa.

[03]ekatoupasampannaaya ^a^M0.0231^ea^ vosaasantiyaa na nivaareti, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampannaaya upasampannasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampannaaya ^a^T2.0520^ea^ vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. anupasampannaaya anupasampannasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 561^b^.^eb^ anaapatti attano bhatta.m daapeti na deti, a~n~nesa.m bhatta.m deti na daapeti, ya.m na dinna.m ta.m daapeti, yattha na dinna.m tattha daapeti, sabbesa.m samaka.m daapeti, sikkhamaanaa vosaasati, saama.nerii vosaasati, pa~nca bhojanaani .thapetvaa sabbattha, anaapatti, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] dutiyapaa.tidesaniiyasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 562^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0521^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena saavatthiya.m a~n~natara.m kula.m ubhatopasanna.m hoti. saddhaaya va.d.dhati, bhogena haayati, ya.m tasmi.m kule uppajjati purebhatta.m khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa ta.m sabba.m bhikkhuuna.m vissajjetvaa appekadaa anasitaa acchanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa na matta.m jaanitvaa pa.tiggahessanti! ime imesa.m datvaa appekadaa anasitaa acchantii''ti!! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane ^a^P4.0179^ea^ etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ya.m kula.m saddhaaya va.d.dhati, bhogena haayati evaruupassa kulassa ~nattidutiyena kammena sekkhasammuti.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 563^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaama.m kula.m saddhaaya va.d.dhati, bhogena haayati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaamassa kulassa sekkhasammuti.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu ^a^M0.0232^ea^ ^a^V0.0236^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaama.m kula.m saddhaaya va.d.dhati, bhogena ^a^T2.0522^ea^ haayati. sa"ngho itthannaamassa kulassa sekkhasammuti.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa kulassa sekkhasammutiyaa daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dinnaa sa"nghena itthannaamassa kulassa sekkhasammuti. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.
[03]eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]^b^``yaani kho pana taani sekkhasammataani kulaani, yo pana bhikkhu tathaaruupesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa khaadeyya vaa bhu~njeyya vaa, pa.tidesetabba.m tena bhikkhunaa -- `gaarayha.m, aavuso, dhamma.m aapajji.m asappaaya.m paa.tidesaniiya.m ta.m pa.tidesemii'''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 564^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena saavatthiya.m ussavo hoti. manussaa bhikkhuu nimantetvaa bhojenti. tampi kho kula.m bhikkhuu nimantesi. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naadhivaasenti -- ``pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa sekkhasammatesu kulesu khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa khaaditu.m bhu~njitu''nti. te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``ki.m nu kho naama amhaaka.m jiivitena ya.m ayyaa amhaaka.m na pa.tigga.nhantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, nimantitena sekkhasammatesu kulesu khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m ^a^T2.0523^ea^ vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa khaaditu.m bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]^b^``yaani kho pana taani sekkhasammataani kulaani, yo pana bhikkhu tathaaruupesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu pubbe animantito^eb^ ^a^P4.0180^ea^ ^b^khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa khaadeyya^eb^ ^a^V0.0237^ea^ ^b^vaa bhu~njeyya vaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0233^ea^, ^b^pa.tidesetabba.m tena bhikkhunaa -- `gaarayha.m, aavuso, dhamma.m aapajji.m asappaaya.m paa.tidesaniiya.m, ta.m pa.tidesemii'''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 565^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu tassa kulassa kuluupako hoti. atha kho so bhikkhu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena ta.m kula.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu gilaano hoti. atha kho te manussaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``bhu~njatha, bhante''ti. atha kho so bhikkhu -- ``bhagavataa pa.tikkhitta.m animantitena sekkhasammatesu kulesu khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa khaaditu.m bhu~njitu''nti kukkuccaayanto na pa.tiggahesi; naasakkhi pi.n.daaya caritu.m; chinnabhatto ahosi. atha kho so bhikkhu aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanena bhikkhunaa sekkhasammatesu kulesu khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa khaaditu.m ^a^T2.0524^ea^ bhu~njitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 566^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yaani kho pana taani sekkhasammataani kulaani, yo pana bhikkhu tathaaruupesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu pubbe animantito agilaano khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa khaadeyya vaa bhu~njeyya vaa, pa.tidesetabba.m tena bhikkhunaa -- `gaarayha.m, aavuso, dhamma.m aapajji.m asappaaya.m paa.tidesaniiya.m, ta.m pa.tidesemii''^eb^ti.

[03] 570^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0526^ea^ ^a^M0.0235^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. tena kho pana samayena saakiyadaasakaa avaruddhaa honti. saakiyaaniyo icchanti aara~n~nakesu senaasanesu bhatta.m kaatu.m. assosu.m kho saakiyadaasakaa -- ``saakiyaaniyo kira aara~n~nakesu senaasanesu bhatta.m kattukaamaa''ti. te magge pariyu.t.thi.msu. saakiyaaniyo ^a^P4.0182^ea^ pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya aara~n~naka.m senaasana.m agama.msu. saakiyadaasakaa nikkhamitvaa saakiyaaniyo acchindi.msu ca duusesu~nca. saakiyaa nikkhamitvaa te core sabha.n.de {saha bha.n.dena (ka0)} gahetvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa aaraame core pa.tivasante naarocessantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu saakiyaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaami dasa atthavase pa.ticca -- sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 572^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yaani kho pana taani aara~n~nakaani senaasanaani saasa"nkasammataani sappa.tibhayaani, yo pana bhikkhu tathaaruupesu senaasanesu^eb^ ^a^P4.0183^ea^^b^ pubbe appa.tisa.mvidita.m khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa ajjhaaraame sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa agilaano khaadeyya vaa bhu~njeyya vaa, pa.tidesetabba.m tena bhikkhunaa -- `gaarayha.m, aavuso, dhamma.m^eb^ ^a^T2.0528^ea^ ^b^aapajji.m asappaaya.m paa.tidesaniiya.m, ta.m pa.tidesemii'''^eb^ti.
